GP12brndp2_u:3303: susaṃvṛtte pradeśe ca ṇantardhāya vasuṃdharām // BndP_2,14.71 //
GP12brndp2_u:3305: divā udaṅmukhaḥ kuryādrātrau vai dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ // BndP_2,14.72 //
GP12brndp2_u:3307: śaucaṃ vāmena hastena gude tisrastu mṛttikāḥ // BndP_2,14.73 //
GP12brndp2_u:3309: ubhābhyāṃ vā punardadyāddvābhyāṃ sapta tu mṛttikāḥ // BndP_2,14.74 //
GP12brndp2_u:3310: mṛdā prakṣālya pādau tu ācamya ca yathāvidhi /
GP12brndp2_u:3317: spṛṣṭvā śvānaṃ śvapākaṃ ca taptakṛcchraṃ samācaret // BndP_2,14.78 //
GP12brndp2_u:3321: pītvā cāpobhūtilapā gatvā cāpi yugaṃ dharam // BndP_2,14.80 //
GP12brndp2_u:3325: gacchatāṃ rāgasaṃmohātteṣāṃ pāpaṃ na gacchati // BndP_2,14.82 //
GP12brndp2_u:3327: āruhya bhṛgutuṅgaṃ tu gatvā puṇyāṃ sarasvatīm // BndP_2,14.83 //
GP12brndp2_u:3328: āpagāṃ ca nadīṃ ramyāṃ gaṅgāṃ devīṃ mahānadīm /
GP12brndp2_u:3334: arddhamāsaṃ tu vaiśyasya māsaṃ śūdrasya caiva ha /
GP12brndp2_u:3339: etadeva bhavecchaucaṃ maithune vamane tathā // BndP_2,14.89 //
GP12brndp2_u:3340: mṛdā prakṣālyahastau tu kuryācchaucaṃ ca mānavaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3341: prakṣālya cādbhiḥ snātvā tu hastau caiva punarmṛdā // BndP_2,14.90 //
GP12brndp2_u:3342: triḥ kṛtvā dvādaśāntāni yathā lepastathā bhavet /
GP12brndp2_u:3345: araṇye śaucametattu grāmyaṃ vakṣyāmyataḥ param // BndP_2,14.92 //
GP12brndp2_u:3349: kaṇṭhaṃ śiro vā āvṛtya rathyāpaṇagato 'pi vā // BndP_2,14.94 //
GP12brndp2_u:3351: pakṣālya pātraṃ nikṣipya ācamyābhyukṣaṇaṃ tataḥ // BndP_2,14.95 //
GP12brndp2_u:3353: puṣpādīnāṃ tṛṇānāṃ ca prokṣaṇaṃ haviṣāṃ tathā // BndP_2,14.96 //
GP12brndp2_u:3355: nāprokṣitaṃ spṛśetkiñcicchraddhe daive 'tha vā punaḥ // BndP_2,14.97 //
GP12brndp2_u:3359: dakṣiṇena tu hastena dakṣiṇāṃ vedimālabhet // BndP_2,14.99 //
GP12brndp2_u:3363: ucchiṣṭānāṃ ca saṃsparśe tathā pādāvasecane // BndP_2,14.101 //
GP12brndp2_u:3365: saṃdeheṣu ca sarveṣu śikhāṃ muktvā tathaiva ca // BndP_2,14.102 //
GP12brndp2_u:3368: jihvayā caiva saṃsvṛśya detāsaktaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3371: upaviśya śucau deśe prayataḥ prāgudaṅmukhaḥ // BndP_2,14.105 //
GP12brndp2_u:3372: pādau prakṣālya hastau ca antarjānu tvapaḥ spṛśet /
GP12brndp2_u:3375: khāni mūrddhānamātmānaṃ hastau pādau tathaiva ca // BndP_2,14.107 //
GP12brndp2_u:3379: kriyāṃ yaḥ kurute mohādanāsamyeha nāstikaḥ // BndP_2,14.109 //
GP12brndp2_u:3380: bhavanti hi vṛthā tasya kriyā hyetā na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3385: ato 'nyathā tu yaḥ kuryānmohācchaucasya saṃkaram // BndP_2,14.112 //
GP12brndp2_u:3389: śaucena mokṣaṃ kurvāṇaḥ svargavāsī bhavennaraḥ // BndP_2,14.114 //
GP12brndp2_u:3397: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde śrāddhakalpe 'śaucavidhirnāma caturdaśo 'dhyoyaḥ // 14//
GP12brndp2_u:3400: śrutā naḥ śrāddhakalpāstu ṛṣibhirye prakīrttitāḥ // BndP_2,15.1 //
GP12brndp2_u:3401: atīva vistaro hyasya viśeṣeṇa tu kīrttitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3402: devāśeṣaṃ mahāprājña ṛṣestasya mataṃ yathā // BndP_2,15.2 //
GP12brndp2_u:3404: kīrttayiṣyāmi vo viprā ṛṣestasya mataṃ tu yat /
GP12brndp2_u:3405: śrāddhaṃ prati mahābhāgastanme śruṇuta vistarāt // BndP_2,15.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:3409: daive pitrye ca niyataṃ śrūyate vai parīkṣaṇam // BndP_2,15.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:3412: avijñātaṃ dvijaṃ śrāddhe na parīkṣeta paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3413: siddhā hi viprarūpeṇa caranti pṛthivīmimām // BndP_2,15.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:3419: vyañjanāni tu vakṣyāmi phalaṃ teṣāṃ tathaiva ca // BndP_2,15.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:3420: agniṣṭomaṃ payasā prāpnuyādvai phalaṃ tathokthasya ca pāyasena /
GP12brndp2_u:3421: saṣoḍaśī satraphalaṃ ghṛtena madhvātirātrasya phalaṃ tathaiva // BndP_2,15.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:3422: tathāpnuyācchraddadhā no naro vai sarvaiḥ kāmairbhojayedyastu viprān /
GP12brndp2_u:3423: sarvārthadaṃ sarvaviprātitheyaṃ phalaṃ ca bhuṅkte sarvamedhasya nityam // BndP_2,15.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:3425: taṃ vai devā nirasyanti hato yadvatparāvasuḥ // BndP_2,15.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:3431: vālakhilyo yatiścaiva vijñeyo hyatithiḥ sadā // BndP_2,15.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:3434: nāvratī na ca saṃkīrṇo nāvidyo nāviśeṣavit /
GP12brndp2_u:3435: na ca saṃtānasaṃbaddho na devī nāgase 'tithiḥ // BndP_2,15.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:3437: tasmai satkṛtya dātavyaṃ yajñamya phalamicchatā // BndP_2,15.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:3438: na vaktavyaṃ sadā vipra kṣudhite nāsti kiñcana /
GP12brndp2_u:3439: tasmai satkṛtya dātavyaṃ sadāpacitireva saḥ // BndP_2,15.20 //
GP12brndp2_u:3441: ekāntaśīlaṃ dhīmantaṃ sadā śrāddheṣu bhojayet // BndP_2,15.21 //
GP12brndp2_u:3442: no dadāmi tamityevaṃ brūyādyo vai durātmavān /
GP12brndp2_u:3443: api jātiśataṃ gatvā na sa mucyeta kilbiṣāt // BndP_2,15.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:3445: niyukto hyani yukto vā paṅktyā harati kilbiṣam // BndP_2,15.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:3453: ya ete pūrvanirddiṣṭāḥ sarve te hyanupūrvaśaḥ // BndP_2,15.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:3461: trināciketastrai vidyo yaśca dharmāndvijaḥ paṭhet // BndP_2,15.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:3463: sarve te pāvanā viprāḥ paṅktīnāṃ samudātdṛtāḥ // BndP_2,15.32 //
GP12brndp2_u:3464: āmantritastu yaḥ śrāddhe yoṣitaṃ sevate dvijaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3467: yatiṃ vā vālakhilyaṃ vā bhojayecchrāddakarmaṇi // BndP_2,15.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:3471: yatīnāṃ tu kṛtā pūjā sākṣādbrahmā tuṃ pūjitaḥ // BndP_2,15.36 //
GP12brndp2_u:3473: catvārastvāśramāḥ pūcyāḥ śrāddhe deve tathaiva ca // BndP_2,15.37 //
GP12brndp2_u:3477: ayatirmokṣavādī ca śrutau tau paṅktidūṣakau // BndP_2,15.39 //
GP12brndp2_u:3479: nindanti ca dvijātibhyaḥ sarve te paṅktidūṣakāḥ // BndP_2,15.40 //
GP12brndp2_u:3481: dhyānaṃ nindanti ye kecitsarve te paṅktidūṣakāḥ // BndP_2,15.41 //
GP12brndp2_u:3485: gāya nānvedavṛttāṃśca havyakavye na bhojayet // BndP_2,15.43 //
GP12brndp2_u:3487: yo 'śnāti saha śūdreṇā sarve te paṅktidūṣaṇāḥ // BndP_2,15.44 //
GP12brndp2_u:3488: vyākarṣaṇaṃ sattvanibarhaṇaṃ ca kṛṣirvaṇijyā paśupālanaṃ ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3495: na viyogāstu vedānāṃ yo niyuṅkte sa pāpakṛt // BndP_2,15.48 //
GP12brndp2_u:3500: vṛttireṣā tu vaiśyasya brāhmaṇasya tu pātakam /
GP12brndp2_u:3502: ubhau tau nārhataḥ śrāddhaṃ putrikāpatireva ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3503: vṛthā dārāṃśca yo gacchedyo yajeta vṛthādhvaraiḥ // BndP_2,15.52 //
GP12brndp2_u:3505: striyo raktāntarā yeṣāṃ paradāraparāśca ye // BndP_2,15.53 //
GP12brndp2_u:3508: stenaśca sarvayājī ca sarve te paṅktidūṣakāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3509: yaśca sūkaravadbhuṅkte yaśca pāṇitale dvijaḥ // BndP_2,15.55 //
GP12brndp2_u:3510: na tadaśnanti pitaro yaśca vācyaṃ samaśnute /
GP12brndp2_u:3515: avaśeṣaṃ tu dātavyamannādyaṃ tu viśeṣataḥ // BndP_2,15.58 //
GP12brndp2_u:3517: yāvanna śrapitaṃ cānnaṃ yāvatauṣṇyaṃ na muñcati // BndP_2,15.59 //
GP12brndp2_u:3519: dattaṃ pratigraho homo bhojanaṃ balireva ca // BndP_2,15.60 //
GP12brndp2_u:3520: sāṃguṣṭhena tathā pādyaṃ nāsurebhyo yathā bhavet /
GP12brndp2_u:3521: etānyeva ca sarvāṇi dānāni ca viśeṣataḥ // BndP_2,15.61 //
GP12brndp2_u:3524: ye tu vṛtte sthitā nityaṃ jñānino dhyāninastathā /
GP12brndp2_u:3527: sarvaṃ yogeśvarairvyāptaṃ trailokyaṃ hi nirantaram // BndP_2,15.64 //
GP12brndp2_u:3529: vyaktāvyaktaṃ vaśe kṛtvā sarvasyāpi ca yatparam // BndP_2,15.65 //
GP12brndp2_u:3530: satyāsatyaṃ ca yaddṛṣṭaṃ sada sacca mahātmabhiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3532: tasmātteṣāṃ sadā bhaktaḥ phalaṃ prāpnoti vottamam // BndP_2,15.67 //
GP12brndp2_u:3533: ṛcaśca yo veda sa veda vedānyajūṃṣi yo veda yajñam /
GP12brndp2_u:3534: sāmāni yo veda sa veda brahma yo mānasaṃ veda sa veda sarvam // BndP_2,15.68 //
GP12brndp2_u:3535: iti śrī brahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde śrāddhakalpe brāhmaṇaparīkṣā nāma pañcadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ // 15//
GP12brndp2_u:3537: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi dānāni ca phalāni ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3544: āyuḥ prākāśyamaiśvaryaṃ rūpaṃ ca labhate śubham // BndP_2,16.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:3546: pāvanaṃ sarva viprāṇāṃ brahmadānasya tatphalam // BndP_2,16.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:3550: dhenuṃ salabhate divyāṃ payodāṃ sukhado hinīm // BndP_2,16.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:3552: śobhanaṃ labhate yānaṃ pādayoḥ sukhamedhate // BndP_2,16.8 //
GP12brndp2_u:3553: vyacanaṃ tālavṛntaṃ ca dattvā viprāya satkṛtam /
GP12brndp2_u:3555: śrāddhe hyupānahau dattvā brāhmaṇebhyaḥ sadā budhaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3556: divyaṃ sa labhate yānaṃ vājiyuktaṃ navaṃ tathā // BndP_2,16.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:3557: śrāddhe chatraṃ tu yo dadyātpuṣpamālānvitaṃ tathā /
GP12brndp2_u:3560: śrāddhe dattvā yatibhyastu nākapṛṣṭhe mahīyate // BndP_2,16.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:3562: vāhanāni ca divyāni prayutānyarbudāni ca // BndP_2,16.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:3566: vasetsa tu vimānāgre stūyamānaḥ samantataḥ // BndP_2,16.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:3568: suślakṣmāni suvarṇāni śrāddhe pātrāṇi dāpayet // BndP_2,16.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:3571: mitrāṇi labhate loke strīṣu saubhāgyameva ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3572: yaḥ pātraṃ taijasaṃ dadyānmanojña śrāddhabhojanaiḥ // BndP_2,16.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:3573: pātraṃ bhavati kāmānā rūpasya ca dhanasya ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3574: rājataṃ kāñcanaṃ vāpi yo dadyācchrāddhakarmaṇi // BndP_2,16.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:3576: dhenuṃ śrāddhe tu yo dadyādgṛṣṭiṃ kumbhāpadohanīm // BndP_2,16.20 //
GP12brndp2_u:3578: dadyādyaḥ śiśire cāgniṃ bahukāṣṭhaṃ prayatnataḥ // BndP_2,16.21 //
GP12brndp2_u:3580: indhanāni tu yo dadyā ddvijebhyaḥ śiśirāgame // BndP_2,16.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:3581: nityaṃ jayati saṃgrāme śriyā juṣṭastu jāyate /
GP12brndp2_u:3582: surabhīṇi ca mālyāni gandhavanti tathaiva ca // BndP_2,16.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:3583: pūjayitvā tu pātrebhyaḥ śrāddhe satkṛtya dāpayet /
GP12brndp2_u:3584: gandhamālyaṃ mahātmānaṃ sukhāni vividhāni ca // BndP_2,16.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:3588: śrāddhakāle guṇavati vipre vai samupasthite // BndP_2,16.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:3589: iṣṭadravyaṃ ca yo dadyātsmṛtiṃ medhāṃ ca vindati /
GP12brndp2_u:3590: sarpiḥpūrṇāni pātrāṇi śrāddhe satkṛtya dāpayet // BndP_2,16.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:3592: śrāddhe yathepsitaṃ dattvā puṇḍarīkaphalaṃ labhet // BndP_2,16.28 //
GP12brndp2_u:3598: asmiṃlloke ca saṃpannaṃ syandanaṃ ca suvāhanaiḥ // BndP_2,16.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:3604: bahubhāryāḥ surūpāśca putrā bhṛtyāśca kiṅkarāḥ // BndP_2,16.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:3606: kauśeyaṃ kṣaumakārpāsaṃ dukūlaṃ gahanaṃ tathā // BndP_2,16.35 //
GP12brndp2_u:3608: alakṣmīṃ nāśayantyete tamaḥ sūryodayo yathā // BndP_2,16.36 //
GP12brndp2_u:3612: tasmādvastrāṇi deyāni śrāddhakāle tu nityaśaḥ // BndP_2,16.38 //
GP12brndp2_u:3613: tāni sarvāṇyavāpnoti śrāddhe dattvā tu mānavaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3618: kṛsara madhusarpiśca payaḥ pāyasameva ca // BndP_2,16.41 //
GP12brndp2_u:3621: dattvā na śocate śrāddhe varṣāsu ca maghāsu ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3630: śrāddheṣvetāni yo dadyātpadmaṃ sa labhate nidhim // BndP_2,16.47 //
GP12brndp2_u:3632: sarvabhogānavāpnoti pūjyate ca divaṃ gataḥ // BndP_2,16.48 //
GP12brndp2_u:3637: savyañjanaṃ tathā snigdhaṃ bhaktyā satkṛtya yatnataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3644: annaṃ prajāpatiḥ sākṣātte na sarvamidaṃ tatam // BndP_2,16.54 //
GP12brndp2_u:3645: tasmādannasamaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GP12brndp2_u:3646: yāni ratnāni medinyāṃ vāhanāni striyastathā // BndP_2,16.55 //
GP12brndp2_u:3647: kṣipraṃ prāpnoti tatsarvaṃ pitṛbhaktastu yo naraḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3648: pratiśrayaṃ ca yo dadyādatithibyaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ // BndP_2,16.56 //
GP12brndp2_u:3652: dānāni paramo dharmaḥ sadbhiḥ satkṛtya pūjitaḥ // BndP_2,16.58 //
GP12brndp2_u:3653: trailokyasyā dhipatyaṃ hi dānenaiva dhruvaṃ sthitam /
GP12brndp2_u:3655: kṣīṇāyurlabhate cāyuḥ pitṛbhaktaḥ sadā naraḥ // BndP_2,16.59 //
GP12brndp2_u:3656: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde
GP12brndp2_u:3664: ādyāpūpaiḥ sadākāryā māṃsairanyā sadā bhavet // BndP_2,17.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:3665: śākaiḥ kāryā tṛtīyā syādevaṃ dravyagato vidhiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3666: atrāpīṣṭaṃ pitṝṇāṃ vai nityameva vidhīyate // BndP_2,17.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:3667: yā cāpyanyā caturthī syāttāṃ ca kuryādviśeṣataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3668: āsu śrāddhaṃ budhaḥ kurvansarvasvenāpi nityaśaḥ // BndP_2,17.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:3669: kṣipramāpnoti hi śreyaḥ paratreha ca modate /
GP12brndp2_u:3676: puṣṭiṃ prajāṃ smṛtiṃ medhāṃ putrānaiśvaryameva ca // BndP_2,17.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:3677: kurvāṇaḥ pūjanaṃ cāsu sarvaṃ pūrṇaṃ samaśnute /
GP12brndp2_u:3678: pratipaddhanalābhāya labdhaṃ cāsya na naśyati // BndP_2,17.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:3680: varārthināṃ tṛtīyā tu śatrughnī pāpanāśinī // BndP_2,17.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:3682: pañcamyāṃ cāpikurvāṇaḥ prāpnoti mahatīṃ śriyam // BndP_2,17.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:3684: kurute yastu saptamyāṃ śrāddhāni satataṃ naraḥ // BndP_2,17.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:3688: kurvandaśamyāṃ tu naro brāhmīṃ śriyamavāpnuyāt // BndP_2,17.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:3690: ekādaśyāṃ paraṃ dānamaiśvarya satataṃ tathā // BndP_2,17.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:3694: yuvānaśca gṛhe yasya mṛtāstebhyaḥ pradāpayet // BndP_2,17.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:3695: śastreṇa vā hatā ye ca teṣāṃ dadyāccaturdaśīm /
GP12brndp2_u:3696: amāvāsyāṃ prayatnena śrāddhaṃ kuryātsadā śuciḥ // BndP_2,17.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:3703: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde
GP12brndp2_u:3707: tāni me śṛṇu kāryāṇi nakṣatreṣu pṛthak pṛthak // BndP_2,18.1 //
GP12brndp2_u:3708: śrāddhaṃ yaḥ kṛttikāyogaṃ kurute satataṃ naraḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3709: agnīnādhāya sa svarge rājate sudṛḍhavrataḥ // BndP_2,18.2 //
GP12brndp2_u:3713: puṣṭikāmaḥ punastiṣye śrāddhaṃ kurvīta mānavaḥ // BndP_2,18.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:3715: jātīnāṃ bhavati śreṣṭho maghāsu śrāddhamācaran // BndP_2,18.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:3717: pradānaśīlaḥ sāpatya uttarāsu karoti yaḥ // BndP_2,18.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:3719: citrāyāṃ caiva yaḥ kuryātpaśyedrūpavataḥ sutān // BndP_2,18.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:3721: putrārthī tu viśākhāsu śrāddhamīheta mālavaḥ // BndP_2,18.8 //
GP12brndp2_u:3723: ādhipatyaṃ bhavecchreṣṭhaṃ jyeṣṭhāyāṃ satataṃ tu yaḥ // BndP_2,18.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:3725: uttarāsu tu kurvāṇo vītaśoko bhavennaraḥ // BndP_2,18.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:3727: rājyabhāgī dhaniṣṭhāsu prāpnuyā dvipulaṃ dhanam // BndP_2,18.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:3735: kṛtsnāṃ balena so 'kliṣṭho labhdhvā ca praśaśāsa ha // BndP_2,18.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:3736: iti śrī brahāmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde
GP12brndp2_u:3739: kiṃ sviddattaṃ pitṝṇāṃ tu tṛptidaṃ vadatāṃ vara /
GP12brndp2_u:3742: havīṣi śrāddhakalpe tu yāni śrāddhavido viduḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3743: tāni me śṛṇu sarvāṇi phalaṃ caiṣāṃ yathātatham // BndP_2,19.2 //
GP12brndp2_u:3745: dattena māsaṃ prīyante śrāddhena hi pitāmahāḥ // BndP_2,19.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:3746: matsyaiḥ prīṇanti dvau māsau trīnmāsānhāriṇena tu /
GP12brndp2_u:3747: śāśena caturo māsānpañca prīṇāti śākunaiḥ // BndP_2,19.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:3751: gavayasya tu māṃsena tṛptiḥ syāddaśamāsikī // BndP_2,19.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:3753: śrāddhe ca tṛptidaṃ gavyaṃ payaḥ saṃvatsaraṃ dvijāḥ // BndP_2,19.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:3755: pāyasaṃ madhusarpirbhyāṃ chāyāyāṃ kuñjarasya ca // BndP_2,19.8 //
GP12brndp2_u:3757: atra gāthāḥ pitṛgītāḥ kīrtayanti purāvidaḥ // BndP_2,19.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:3759: api naḥ sa kule yāyādyo no dadyāt trayodaśīm // BndP_2,19.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:3760: ājena sarvalohena varṣāsu ca maghāsu ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3761: eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā yadyeko 'pi gayāṃ vrajet /
GP12brndp2_u:3762: gaurīṃ vāpyudvahedbhāryāṃ nālaṃ vā vṛṣamutsṛjet // BndP_2,19.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:3764: gayādīnāṃ phalaṃ tāta brūhi me paripṛcchataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3765: dātṝṇāṃ caiva yatpuṇyaṃ nikhilena pravīhi me // BndP_2,19.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:3768: pitṛkṣaye hi tatputra tasmāttatrākṣayaṃ smṛtam // BndP_2,19.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:3771: phalaṃ vṛṣasya vakṣyāmi gadato me nibodhata // BndP_2,19.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:3776: sarvaṃ tadakṣayaṃ tasya pitṝṇāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // BndP_2,19.17 //
GP12brndp2_u:3778: madhukulyāḥ pitṝṃstasya hyakṣayāśca bhavanti vai // BndP_2,19.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:3780: tṛptistu yā pitṝṇāṃ vai sā vṛṣeṇeha kalpate // BndP_2,19.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:3782: madhu vāmadhumiśraṃ vā sarvamevākṣayaṃ bhavet // BndP_2,19.20 //
GP12brndp2_u:3783: na brāhmaṇaṃ parikṣeta sadā deyaṃ hi mānavaiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3784: daivekarmaṇi pitrye ca śrūyate vai parīkṣaṇam // BndP_2,19.21 //
GP12brndp2_u:3786: ye ca bhāṣāvidaḥ kecidye ca vyākaraṇe ratāḥ // BndP_2,19.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:3788: triṇāciketaḥ pañcāgniḥ sa sauparṇaḥ ṣaḍaṅgavit // BndP_2,19.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:3790: puṇyeṣu yaśca tīrtheṣu kṛtasnānaḥ kṛtavrataḥ // BndP_2,19.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:3792: ye ca satyavratā nityaṃ svadharmaniratāśca ye // BndP_2,19.25 //
GP12brndp2_u:3798: pavitrāṇāṃ pavitraṃ ca maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam // BndP_2,19.28 //
GP12brndp2_u:3808: stavakaḥ sūpakāraśca yaśca mitrāṇi nindati // BndP_2,19.33 //
GP12brndp2_u:3812: vikrīṇāti ca yo brahmavratāni niyamāṃstathā // BndP_2,19.35 //
GP12brndp2_u:3814: yaccavāṇijake dattaṃ neha nāmutra saṃbhavet // BndP_2,19.36 //
GP12brndp2_u:3816: tathā pāṇavike vai ca kāruke dharmavarjite // BndP_2,19.37 //
GP12brndp2_u:3819: bhasmanīva hutaṃ havyaṃ dattaṃ paunarbhave dvijaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3820: ṣaṣṭiṃ kāṇaḥ śataṃ ṣaṇḍhaḥ śvitrī pañcaśatānyapi // BndP_2,19.39 //
GP12brndp2_u:3822: bhraśyeddhi sa phalāttasmātpradātā yastu bāliśaḥ // BndP_2,19.40 //
GP12brndp2_u:3826: śvā caiva brahmahā caiva nāvekṣeta kathañcana // BndP_2,19.42 //
GP12brndp2_u:3828: rākṣasānāṃ tilāḥ proktāḥ śunāṃ parivṛtāstathā // BndP_2,19.43 //
GP12brndp2_u:3831: nadītīreṣu ramyeṣu saritsu ca sarassu ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3832: vivikteṣu ca prīyante datteneha pitāmahāḥ // BndP_2,19.45 //
GP12brndp2_u:3838: śuklapakṣe ca pūrvāṅṇe śrāddhaṃ kuryādyathāvidhi // BndP_2,19.48 //
GP12brndp2_u:3839: kṛṣṇapakṣe 'paraṅṇe tu rauhiṇaṃ vai na laṅghayet /
GP12brndp2_u:3841: sadā vai pitaraḥ pūjyāḥ saṃ prāptau deśakālayoḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3842: pitṛbhaktyaiva tu naro yogaṃ prāpnoti durllabham // BndP_2,19.50 //
GP12brndp2_u:3843: dhyānena mokṣaṃ gaccheddhi hitvā karma śubhāśubham /
GP12brndp2_u:3846: amṛtaṃ guhyamuddhṛtya yoge yogavidāṃ varāḥ // BndP_2,19.52 //
GP12brndp2_u:3848: devānāṃ paramaṃ guhyamṛṣīṇāṃ ca parāyaṇam // BndP_2,19.53 //
GP12brndp2_u:3854: yeṣu cāpyakṣayaṃ śrāddhaṃ tīrtheṣu ca guhāsu ca // BndP_2,19.56 //
GP12brndp2_u:3856: śrutvemaṃ śrāddhakalpaṃ ca na kuryādyastu mānavaḥ // BndP_2,19.57 //
GP12brndp2_u:3858: parivādo na karttavyo yogināṃ tu viśeṣataḥ // BndP_2,19.58 //
GP12brndp2_u:3861: sa gacchennarakaṃ ghoraṃ śrotāpyasya na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3865: sahi kālaṃ ciraṃ majjennarake nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3866: kuṃbhīpākeṣu pacyante jihvācchede punaḥ punaḥ // BndP_2,19.61 //
GP12brndp2_u:3867: samudre ca yathā loṣaṭastadbatsīdanti te narāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3868: manasā karmaṇā vācā dveṣaṃ yogeṣu varjayet /
GP12brndp2_u:3869: protyānantaṃ phalaṃ bhuṅkta iha vāpi na saṃśayaḥ // BndP_2,19.62 //
GP12brndp2_u:3870: na pārago vindati paramātmanastrilokamadhye carati svakarmamiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3871: ṛco yajuḥ sāma tadaṅgapārage 'vikārametaṃ hyanavāpya sīdati // BndP_2,19.63 //
GP12brndp2_u:3873: yaḥ syāccaturviśatitattvapāragaḥ sa pārago nādhyayanasya pāragaḥ // BndP_2,19.64 //
GP12brndp2_u:3875: pratyāharedyogapathaṃ na yo dvijo na sarvapāra kramapāragocaraḥ // BndP_2,19.65 //
GP12brndp2_u:3876: vedasya veditavyaṃ ca vedyaṃ vindati yogavit /
GP12brndp2_u:3878: vedaṃ ca veditavyaṃ ca viditvā vai yathāsthitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3879: evaṃ vedavidaḥ prāhuranyaṃ vai vedapāragam // BndP_2,19.67 //
GP12brndp2_u:3881: prāpnotyāyuḥ prajāścaiva pitṛbhakto na saśayaḥ // BndP_2,19.68 //
GP12brndp2_u:3882: śraddhayā śrāddhakalpaṃ tu yastvimaṃ niyataḥ paṭhet /
GP12brndp2_u:3888: tīrthādīnāṃ phalaṃ prāpya dānādīnāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3890: iha cāpi parā puṣṭhistasmātkurvīta nityaśaḥ // BndP_2,19.72 //
GP12brndp2_u:3891: imaṃ vidhiṃ yo hi paṭhedatandritaḥ samāhitaḥ saṃsadi parvasaṃdhiṣu /
GP12brndp2_u:3892: apatyabhāgī ca pareṇa tejasā divaukasāṃ sa vrajate salokatām // BndP_2,19.73 //
GP12brndp2_u:3895: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde
GP12brndp2_u:3899: saptasvete sthitā nityaṃ sthāneṣu pitaro 'vyayāḥ // BndP_2,20.1 //
GP12brndp2_u:3903: śeṣāstu varṇiṃnāṃ jñeyā iti sarve prakīrttitāḥ // BndP_2,20.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:3907: tathā saṃkarajātyaśca mlecchāścāpi yajanti vai // BndP_2,20.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:3908: pitṛṃstu yo yajedbhaktyā pitaraḥ prīṇayanti te /
GP12brndp2_u:3909: pitaraḥ puṣṭikāmasya prajākāmasya vā punaḥ // BndP_2,20.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:3910: puṣṭiṃ prajāṃ tu svargaṃ ca prayacchanti pitāmahāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3913: na hi yogagatiḥ sūkṣmā pitṝṇāṃ jñāyate naraiḥ // BndP_2,20.8 //
GP12brndp2_u:3915: sarveṣāṃ rājataṃ pātramatha vā rajatānvitam // BndP_2,20.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:3916: pāvanaṃ hyuttamaṃ proktaṃ devānāṃ pitṛbhiḥ saha /
GP12brndp2_u:3919: sarvatra varttamānāste piṇḍāḥ prīṇanti vai pitṝn // BndP_2,20.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:3921: yathā goṣṭhe pranaṣṭāṃ vai vatso vindati mātaram // BndP_2,20.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:3923: nāmagotraṃ ca mantraṃ ca dattamannaṃ nayanti tam // BndP_2,20.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:3925: evameṣā sthitā sattā brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ // BndP_2,20.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:3929: kīrttitāḥ pitaraste vai tava putra yathākramam // BndP_2,20.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:3933: dānāni saha śaucena kīrttitāni phalāni ca /
GP12brndp2_u:3939: satre tu vitate pūrvaṃ tathā varṣasahasrake /
GP12brndp2_u:3941: gatāni tatra varṣāṇāṃ pañcāśacca śatāni vai /
GP12brndp2_u:3945: lokānāṃ ca hitārthāya brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā // BndP_2,20.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:3947: evaṃ bṛhaspatiḥ pūrvaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ putreṇa dhīmatā /
GP12brndp2_u:3948: provāca pitṛsargaṃ tu yaścaiva samudāhṛta // BndP_2,20.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:3949: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde
GP12brndp2_u:3962: gantuṃ vyavasito rājandaivena ca niyojitaḥ // BndP_2,21.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:3965: kañcidarthamahaṃ tāta mātaraṃ tvāṃ ca sāmpratam /
GP12brndp2_u:3972: sadīyaṃ tena tatpārśvaṃ gantuṃ māmanujānata // BndP_2,21.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:3974: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā saṃbhrāntaṃ samudīritam /
GP12brndp2_u:3975: harṣeṇa mahatā yuktau sāśrunetrau babhūvatuḥ // BndP_2,21.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:3980: tatra gatvā yathānyāyaṃ taṃ śuśrūṣā parāyaṇaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:3981: kañcitkālaṃ tayorvatsa prītaye vasa tadgṛhe // BndP_2,21.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:3984: kṣaṇārddhamapi śaktāḥ stho na vinā putradarśanam /
GP12brndp2_u:3996: dadarśa rāmo rājendra sa pitāmahamagrataḥ // BndP_2,21.21 //
GP12brndp2_u:4004: āsasāda śanai rāmaḥ samīpe vinayānvitaḥ // BndP_2,21.25 //
GP12brndp2_u:4014: anāyāsena te vṛttirvartate cātha karhicit // BndP_2,21.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:4016: tathā svānugataṃ pitrorbhrātṝṇāṃ caiva ceṣṭitam // BndP_2,21.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:4024: yathā cābhyāṃ pradiṣṭena yayā vaurvāśramaṃ prati // BndP_2,21.35 //
GP12brndp2_u:4066: pituḥ pitāmahaṃ ddaṣṭvā rāmastasya mahātmanaḥ // BndP_2,21.56 //
GP12brndp2_u:4074: abhivādya yathānyāyaṃ khyātiṃ ca vinayānvitaḥ // BndP_2,21.60 //
GP12brndp2_u:4080: kuśalaṃ khalu te vatsa pitrośca kimanāmayam // BndP_2,21.63 //
GP12brndp2_u:4086: piturmātuśca vṛttānta bhrātṝṇāṃ ca mahātmanām // BndP_2,21.66 //
GP12brndp2_u:4088: etadanyacca sakalaṃ bhṛgoḥ sapraśrayaṃ mudā // BndP_2,21.67 //
GP12brndp2_u:4091: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā viśeṣeṇa bhṛguḥ prīto 'bhyanandata /
GP12brndp2_u:4100: śruṇu vatsa vaco mahya yattvāṃ vakṣyāmi sāṃpratam // BndP_2,21.73 //
GP12brndp2_u:4106: prītimutpādya tasya tvaṃ bhaktyānanyagayā cirāt // BndP_2,21.76 //
GP12brndp2_u:4108: tarasā tava bhaktyā ca prīto bhavati śaṅkaraḥ // BndP_2,21.77 //
GP12brndp2_u:4109: kariṣyati ca te sarvaṃ manasā yadyadicchasi /
GP12brndp2_u:4112: tvayā hitārthaṃ devānāṃ karaṇīyaṃ suduṣkaram // BndP_2,21.79 //
GP12brndp2_u:4116: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde ekaviṃśati tamaudhyāyaḥ // 21//
GP12brndp2_u:4125: himavantaṃ girivaraṃ yayau rāmo mahāmanāḥ // BndP_2,22.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:4129: tīrtheṣu kṣetramukhyeṣu nivasanvā yayau śanaiḥ // BndP_2,22.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:4205: tasya praviśya gahanaṃ vanaṃ rāmo mahāmanāḥ // BndP_2,22.44 //
GP12brndp2_u:4207: sa tatra vicarandikṣu hariṇībhiḥ samantataḥ // BndP_2,22.45 //
GP12brndp2_u:4240: vicacāra ciraṃ rāmo mudā paramayā yutaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:4253: sa tasya tīre vipulaṃ kṛtvāśramapadaṃ śubham // BndP_2,22.68 //
GP12brndp2_u:4254: rāmo matimatāṃ śreṣṭhastapase ca mano dadhe /
GP12brndp2_u:4259: aniketaḥ sa varṣāsu śiśire jalasaṃśrayaḥ // BndP_2,22.71 //
GP12brndp2_u:4275: tataḥ sa niṣphalaṃ rūpamaiśvaraṃ yannirañjanam // BndP_2,22.79 //
GP12brndp2_u:4281: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīye upoddhātapāde vasiṣṭhasagarasaṃvāde arcunopākhyāne jāmadagnyatapaścaraṇaṃ nāma dvāviṃśatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 22//
GP12brndp2_u:4294: praśasya tasya te sarveprayayuḥ svaṃ svamāśramam // BndP_2,23.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:4312: tataḥ sa śīghramutthāya samīpamupasṛtya ca // BndP_2,23.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:4319: samaśca sarvabhūteṣu na ca pitrādayo 'pi me /
GP12brndp2_u:4324: jānate tadhyathā sarve deśo 'yaṃ madupāśrayaḥ // BndP_2,23.21 //
GP12brndp2_u:4326: ityeṣa mama vṛttāntaḥ kārtsnyena kathitastava // BndP_2,23.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:4327: tvaṃ ca me brūhi tattvena nijavṛttamaśeṣataḥ /

GP12brndp2_u:5048: adhyāsya ratnanikarairati śaibhi bhadraṃ nidrāmasevata naredra ciraṃ pratītaḥ // BndP_2,27.45 //
GP12brndp2_u:5049: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya
GP12brndp2_u:5059: svapantaṃ vividhā vāco bubodhayiṣavaḥ śaneḥ // BndP_2,28.4 //

GP12brndp2_u:5076: tataḥ sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ samupetya taponidhim /

GP12brndp2_u:5083: śakyaṃ mṛgasadharmāṇāṃ yena kenāpi varttitum // BndP_2,28.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:5085: anabhyastaṃ hi rājendra nanu sarvaṃ hi duṣkaram // BndP_2,28.17 //
GP12brndp2_u:5087: āptastu bhavato nūnaṃ sā gauravasamunnatiḥ // BndP_2,28.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:5089: prahasanniva taṃ bhūyo vacanaṃ pratyabhāṣata // BndP_2,28.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:5091: asmābhimahimā yena vismitaṃ sakalaṃ jagat // BndP_2,28.20 //
GP12brndp2_u:5093: ito na gantumicchanti sainikā me mahāmune // BndP_2,28.21 //
GP12brndp2_u:5096: naiva citraṃ tava vibho śakroti tapasā bhavān /
GP12brndp2_u:5097: dhruvaṃ karttuṃ hi lokānāmavasthātritayaṃ kramāt // BndP_2,28.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:5099: gamiṣyāmi purīṃ brahmannanujānātu māṃ bhavān // BndP_2,28.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:5104: sainyaiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvaiḥ saṃpratasthe purīṃ prati // BndP_2,28.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:5108: kiṃ me sakalarājyena yogarddhyā vāpyanalpayā // BndP_2,28.28 //
GP12brndp2_u:5112: asyā dhenorahaṃ manye kalāṃ nārhati ṣoḍaśīm // BndP_2,28.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:5116: rakṣitena ca rājyena puryā vā kiṃ phalaṃ tava // BndP_2,28.32 //
GP12brndp2_u:5118: varttate nārddhamapi te rājyaṃ śūnyaṃ tava prabho // BndP_2,28.33 //
GP12brndp2_u:5120: bhavanāni manojñāni manojñāśca tathā striyaḥ // BndP_2,28.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:5122: dheno tasyāṃ kṣaṇenaiva vilīnaṃ paśyato mama // BndP_2,28.35 //
GP12brndp2_u:5124: evaṃprabhāvā sā yasya tasya kiṃ durlaṃ bhavet // BndP_2,28.36 //
GP12brndp2_u:5129: brahmasvaṃ nāpahartavyamiti me śaṅkate manaḥ // BndP_2,28.38 //
GP12brndp2_u:5131: gargo matimatāṃ śreṣṭho garhayanniva bhūpate // BndP_2,28.39 //
GP12brndp2_u:5133: brahmasvasadṛśaṃ loke durjaraṃ neha vidyate // BndP_2,28.40 //
GP12brndp2_u:5143: mā kṛthāstaddhi lokeṣu yaśohānikaraṃ tava // BndP_2,28.45 //
GP12brndp2_u:5155: ākṣipya mantrī rājānamidaṃ bhūyo hyabhāṣata // BndP_2,28.51 //
GP12brndp2_u:5157: mahānti rājakāryāṇi dvijairvettuṃ na śakyate // BndP_2,28.52 //
GP12brndp2_u:5159: vinā vai bhojanādāne kāryaṃ vipro na vindati // BndP_2,28.53 //
GP12brndp2_u:5162: tasmātsvīkṛtya tāṃ dhenuṃ prayāhi svapuraṃ nṛpa /
GP12brndp2_u:5165: prasahya haraṇe vāpi nādharmaste bhaviṣyati // BndP_2,28.56 //
GP12brndp2_u:5166: prasahya haraṇe doṣaṃ yadi saṃpaśyase nṛpa /
GP12brndp2_u:5168: svīkartavyā hi sā dhenustvayā tvaṃ ratnabhāgayataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5170: tapodhana balaḥ śāntaḥ prītimānsa nṛpa tvayi /
GP12brndp2_u:5171: tasmātte sarvathā dhenuṃ yācitaḥ saṃpradāsyati // BndP_2,28.59 //
GP12brndp2_u:5173: saṃgṛhya vittaṃ vipulaṃ dhenuṃ tāṃ pratidāsyati // BndP_2,28.60 //
GP12brndp2_u:5175: iti me varttate buddhiḥ kathaṃ vā manyate bhavān // BndP_2,28.61 //
GP12brndp2_u:5177: gatvā tvameva taṃ vipraṃ prasādya ca viśeṣataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5178: dattvā cābhīpsitaṃ tasmai tāṃ gāmānaya mantrika // BndP_2,28.62 //
GP12brndp2_u:5184: tataḥ sa mantrī sabalaḥ samāsādya tadāśramam /
GP12brndp2_u:5188: ratnabhūtā ca dhenuḥ sā bhuvi dogdhrīṣvanuttamā // BndP_2,28.66 //
GP12brndp2_u:5190: ādāya goratnabhūtāṃ dhenuṃ me dātumarhasi // BndP_2,28.67 //
GP12brndp2_u:5192: homadhenuriyaṃ mahyaṃ na dātavyā hi kasyacit /
GP12brndp2_u:5193: rājā vadānyaḥ sa kathaṃ brahmasvamabhivāñchati // BndP_2,28.68 //
GP12brndp2_u:5196: gavāyutena tasmāttvaṃ tasmai tāṃ dātumarhasi // BndP_2,28.69 //
GP12brndp2_u:5199: havirdhānīṃ ca vai tasmānnotsahe dātumañjasā // BndP_2,28.70 //
GP12brndp2_u:5202: dehi dhenumimāmekāṃ tatte śreyo bhaviṣyati // BndP_2,28.71 //
GP12brndp2_u:5205: guruṇā yācitaṃ kiṃ te vacasā nṛpateḥ punaḥ // BndP_2,28.72 //
GP12brndp2_u:5207: tvameva svecchayā rājñe dehi dhenuṃ suhṛttayā /
GP12brndp2_u:5208: yathā balena nītāyāṃ tasyāṃ tvaṃ kiṃ kariṣyasi // BndP_2,28.73 //
GP12brndp2_u:5211: vipro 'haṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi svecchāvitaraṇaṃ vinā // BndP_2,28.74 //
GP12brndp2_u:5215: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe voyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya
GP12brndp2_u:5220: prasahya gāṃ me harato pāpamāpsyasi durmate /
GP12brndp2_u:5223: svayaṃ vā yadi sāyucyedvinaśiṣyati pārthivaḥ // BndP_2,29.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:5227: baddhvā tāṃ gāṃ dṛḍhaiḥ pāśairvicakarṣa balānvitaḥ // BndP_2,29.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:5229: rurodha taṃ yathāśakti vikarṣantaṃ pāyasvinīm // BndP_2,29.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:5231: jagrāha sudṛḍhaṃ kaṇṭhe vāhubhyāṃ tāṃ mahāmuniḥ // BndP_2,29.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:5239: na cukrodhākrodhanatvaṃ sato hi paramaṃ dhanam // BndP_2,29.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:5240: sa ca śaktaḥ svatapasā saṃharttumapi rakṣitum /
GP12brndp2_u:5241: jagatsarvaṃ kṣayaṃ tasya cintayanna pracukrudhe // BndP_2,29.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:5243: rāmeṇābhūttato nityaṃ śānta eva mahātapāḥ // BndP_2,29.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:5248: tataḥ savatsāṃ tā dhenuṃ baddhvā pāśairdṛḍhairnṛpaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5251: hanyamānā bhṛśaṃ taiśca cukrudhe ca payasvinī // BndP_2,29.17 //
GP12brndp2_u:5262: payasvinīṃ vinā vatsaṃ gṛhītvā kiṅkaraiḥ saha /
GP12brndp2_u:5263: sa pāpastarasā rājñaḥ sannidhiṃ samupāgamat // BndP_2,29.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:5266: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamabhāge tṛtīya
GP12brndp2_u:5274: vacanaṃ tarhi tāṃ jahyāṃ vimūḍhātmā gatatrapaḥ // BndP_2,30.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:5280: niśceṣṭaṃ paritaṃ bhūmau dadarśa patimātmanaḥ // BndP_2,30.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:5281: tataḥ sā vihataṃ matvā bharttāraṃ gatacetanam /
GP12brndp2_u:5284: patitvotthāya sā bhūyaḥ susvaraṃ praruroda ha // BndP_2,30.8 //
GP12brndp2_u:5288: hā dhigatyantaśānta tvaṃ naiva kāṅkṣeta cedṛśam // BndP_2,30.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:5290: kṣiptvānāthāmagādhe māṃ kva ca yāto 'si mānada // BndP_2,30.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:5291: satāṃ sāptapade maitre muṣitāhaṃ tvayā saha /
GP12brndp2_u:5292: yāsi yatra tvamekākī tatra māṃ netumarhasi // BndP_2,30.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:5294: na dīryate mahābhāga kaṭhināḥ khalu yoṣitaḥ // BndP_2,30.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:5295: ityevaṃ vilapantī sā rudatī ca muhurmuhuḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5311: na tvādṛśā mahābhāga bhṛśaṃ śocanti kutracit /
GP12brndp2_u:5312: dhṛtimanto mahāntastu duḥkhaṃ kurvati na vyaye // BndP_2,30.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:5314: tyaja śokaṃ mahābāho na tatpātraṃ bhavadṛśāḥ // BndP_2,30.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:5316: śokastasyāvakāśaṃ tvaṃ kathaṃ tdṛdi niyacchasi // BndP_2,30.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:5328: triḥsaptakṛtvo yadidaṃ tvayā vakṣaḥ samāhatam // BndP_2,30.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:5330: haniṣye bhuvi sarvatra satyametadbravimi te // BndP_2,30.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:5333: ityuktā reṇukā tena bhṛśaṃ duḥkhānvitāpi sā /
GP12brndp2_u:5335: tato rāmo mahābāhuḥ pituḥ saha sahodaraiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5343: bhartrā virahitā tena pravarttiṣye vininditā // BndP_2,30.37 //
GP12brndp2_u:5345: yathā tena pravarttiṣye paratrāpi sahāniśam // BndP_2,30.38 //
GP12brndp2_u:5349: pratibhūya na vaktavyaṃ yadi matpriyamicchatha // BndP_2,30.40 //
GP12brndp2_u:5352: etasminneva kāle tu reṇukāṃ tanayaiḥ saha /
GP12brndp2_u:5355: mā kārṣīḥ sāhasaṃ bhadre pravakṣyāmi priyaṃ tava // BndP_2,30.43 //
GP12brndp2_u:5357: na marttavyantvayā sarvo jīvanbhadrāṇi paśyati // BndP_2,30.44 //
GP12brndp2_u:5367: śāyayitvā nivāte tu paritaḥ samupāviśan // BndP_2,30.48 //
GP12brndp2_u:5371: niṣeduḥ sahitā mātrā kāṅkṣanto jīvitaṃ pituḥ // BndP_2,30.50 //
GP12brndp2_u:5382: atha te tu bhṛguṃ dṛṣṭvā vaṃśamya pitaraṃ mudā /
GP12brndp2_u:5385: papraccha kimidaṃ vṛttaṃ tatsarvaṃ te nyavedayan // BndP_2,30.57 //
GP12brndp2_u:5386: tacchrutvā sa bhṛguḥ śīghraṃ jalamādāya mantravit /
GP12brndp2_u:5387: saṃjīvinyā vinayā taṃ siṣeca proccarannidam // BndP_2,30.58 //
GP12brndp2_u:5388: yajñasya tapaso vīya mamāpi śubhamasti cet /
GP12brndp2_u:5392: dṛṣṭvā tatra sthitaṃ vandyaṃ bhṛguṃ svasya pitāmaham /
GP12brndp2_u:5393: nanāma bhaktyā nṛpate kṛtāñjaliruvāca ha // BndP_2,30.61 //
GP12brndp2_u:5395: dhanyo 'haṃ kṛtakṛtyo 'haṃ saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ ca me // BndP_2,30.62 //
GP12brndp2_u:5397: bhagavankiṃ karomyadya śuśrūṣāṃ tava mānada // BndP_2,30.63 //
GP12brndp2_u:5402: atha satkṛtya sa bhṛguṃ papraccha vinayānvitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5403: bhagavan kiṃ kṛtaṃ tena rājñā duṣṭena pātakam // BndP_2,30.66 //
GP12brndp2_u:5405: sādhubuddhyāsa duṣṭātmā kiṃ cakāra mahāmate // BndP_2,30.67 //
GP12brndp2_u:5408: ciraṃ dhyātvā samālocya kāraṇaṃ prāha bhūpate // BndP_2,30.68 //
GP12brndp2_u:5410: śṛṇu tāta mahābhāga bījamasya hi karmaṇaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5411: yaśca vai kṛtavānpāpaṃ sarvajñasya tavānagha // BndP_2,30.69 //
GP12brndp2_u:5412: śaptaḥ purā vasiṣṭhena nāśārthaṃ sa mahīpatiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5413: dvijāparādhato mūḍha vīryaṃ te vinaśiṣyate // BndP_2,30.70 //
GP12brndp2_u:5419: triḥ saptakṛtvo niḥkṣatrāṃ kariṣye pṛthivīmimām // BndP_2,30.73 //
GP12brndp2_u:5422: sa tu rājā mahābhāgo vṛddhānāṃ paryupāsitā /
GP12brndp2_u:5424: sākṣādbhakto mahātmā ca tadvadhe pātakaṃ bhavet /
GP12brndp2_u:5427: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyābhāge tṛtīya
GP12brndp2_u:5431: yaccakāra mahāvīryyo rājñaḥ kruddho hi karmaṇā // BndP_2,31.1 //
GP12brndp2_u:5439: śubhaṃ vāpyaśubhaṃ sarve prakurvanti vimohitāḥ // BndP_2,31.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:5440: śṛṇavantu ṛṣayaḥ sarve pratijñā kriyate mayā /
GP12brndp2_u:5447: śruṇu rāma pravakṣyāmi satāṃ dharmaṃ sanātanam /
GP12brndp2_u:5448: yacchrutvā mānavāḥ sarve jāyante dharmakāriṇaḥ // BndP_2,31.8 //
GP12brndp2_u:5452: teṣāṃ caivākṣayā lokāḥ satataṃ sādhukāriṇām // BndP_2,31.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:5454: na ca kṣobhamavāpnoti sa sādhuḥ parikīrtthate // BndP_2,31.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:5455: tāḍayettāḍayantaṃ yo na ca sādhuḥ sa pāpabhāk /
GP12brndp2_u:5456: kṣamayār'haṇatāṃ prāptāḥ sādhavo brāhmaṇā vayam // BndP_2,31.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:5458: tasmānnivāraye tvādya kṣamāṃ kuru tapaścara // BndP_2,31.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:5463: śṛṇu tāta mahāprājña vi5ptiṃ mama sāṃpratam /
GP12brndp2_u:5464: bhavatā śama uddiṣṭaḥ sādhūnāṃ sumahātmanām // BndP_2,31.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:5466: karttavyo duṣṭaceṣṭeṣu na śamaḥ sukhado bhavet // BndP_2,31.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:5467: tasmādasya vadhaḥ kāryaḥ kārttavīryasya vai mayā /
GP12brndp2_u:5470: śṛṇu rāma mahābhāga vaco mama samāhitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5471: kariṣyasi yathā bhāvi tathā naivānyathā bhavet // BndP_2,31.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:5472: ito vrajatvaṃ brahmāṇāṃ bṛccha tāta hitāhitam /
GP12brndp2_u:5473: sa yadvadiṣyati vibhustatkarttā nātra saṃśayaḥ // BndP_2,31.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:5482: vidyādharīṇāṃ nṛtyaṃ ca paśyantaṃ sasmitaṃ mudā // BndP_2,31.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:5486: dṛṣṭvā tamavyayaṃ bhaktyā praṇanāma bhṛgūdvahaḥ // BndP_2,31.25 //
GP12brndp2_u:5488: papraccha kuśalaṃ vatsa kathamāgamanaṃ kṛthāḥ // BndP_2,31.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:5490: vṛttāntaṃ kārttavīryasya pituḥ svasya mahātmanaḥ // BndP_2,31.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:5494: sṛṣṭi reṣā bhagavataḥ saṃbhavetkṛpayā baṭo // BndP_2,31.29 //
GP12brndp2_u:5496: tannāśakāriṇī caiva pratijñā bhavatā kṛtā // BndP_2,31.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:5498: ekasya rājño doṣeṇa pituḥ paribhavena ca // BndP_2,31.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:5500: āvirbhūtā tirobhūtā harereva punaḥ punaḥ // BndP_2,31.32 //
GP12brndp2_u:5501: avyarthā tvatpratijñā tu bhavitrī prāktanena ca /
GP12brndp2_u:5504: pṛthivyāṃ bahavo bhūpāḥ saṃti śaṅkarakiṅkarāḥ // BndP_2,31.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:5508: upāye tu samārabdhe sarve sidhyantyupakramāḥ // BndP_2,31.36 //
GP12brndp2_u:5512: yathākathaṃ ca vijñāpya śaṅkaraṃ labhadurlabham // BndP_2,31.38 //
GP12brndp2_u:5514: divyapāśupataṃ cāpi dāsyatyeva na saṃśayaḥ // BndP_2,31.39 //
GP12brndp2_u:5515: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya
GP12brndp2_u:5518: brahmaṇo vacanaṃ śrutvā sa praṇamya jagadgurum /
GP12brndp2_u:5519: prasannacetāḥ subhṛśaṃ śivalokaṃ jagāma ha // BndP_2,32.1 //
GP12brndp2_u:5526: vasaṃti yatra yogīndrāḥ siddhāḥ pāśupatāḥ śubhāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5527: koṭikalpatapaḥ puṇyāḥ śāntā nirmatsarā janāḥ // BndP_2,32.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:5529: yogena yoginā sṛṣṭaṃ svecchayā śaṅkareṇa hi // BndP_2,32.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:5530: śilpināṃ guruṇā svapne na dṛṣṭaṃ niśvakarmaṇā /
GP12brndp2_u:5543: vibhūtibhūṣitāṅgau ca vyāghracarmāṃbarau ca tau // BndP_2,32.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:5545: tau dṛṣṭvā manasā bhītaḥ kiñcidāha vinītavat // BndP_2,32.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:5548: tautu tadvacanaṃ śrutvā gṛhītvājñāṃ śivasya ca /
GP12brndp2_u:5551: tatrātiramyāṃ siddhaughaiḥ samākīrṇāṃ sabhāṃ dvijaḥ // BndP_2,32.17 //
GP12brndp2_u:5561: mūrdhnā namāma taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaḥ paramayā mudā // BndP_2,32.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:5563: nandīśvaraṃ mahākālaṃ vīrabhadraṃ ca tatpuraḥ // BndP_2,32.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:5564: kroḍe durgāṃ śatabhujāṃ dṛṣṭvā natvātha tāmapi /
GP12brndp2_u:5565: stotuṃ pracakrame vidvāngirā gadgadayā vibhum // BndP_2,32.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:5570: vedā na śaktā yaṃ stotu mavāṅmanasagocaram /
GP12brndp2_u:5573: na yaṃ viduryathātattvaṃ taṃ namāmi parātparam // BndP_2,32.28 //
GP12brndp2_u:5575: līyante ca punaryasmiṃstaṃ namāmi jaganmayam // BndP_2,32.29 //
GP12brndp2_u:5577: sorddhvalokaṃ sapātālaṃ taṃ namāmi haraṃ param // BndP_2,32.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:5580: yaḥ kālarūpo jagadādikarttā pātā pṛthagrūpadharo jaganmayaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5581: rarttā punā rudravapustathānte taṃ kālarūpaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye // BndP_2,32.32 //
GP12brndp2_u:5582: ityevamuktvā sa tu bhārgavo mudā paṣāta tasyāṅghri samīpa āturaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5583: utthāpya taṃ vāmakareṇa līlayā dadhre tadā mūrdhni karaṃ kṛpārṇavaḥ // BndP_2,32.33 //
GP12brndp2_u:5587: kastvaṃ vaṭo kasyakule prasūtaḥ kiṃ kāryamuddiśya bhavānihāgataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5588: vinirddiśāhaṃ tava bhaktibhāvataḥ prītaḥ pradadyāṃ bhavato manogatam // BndP_2,32.35 //
GP12brndp2_u:5589: ityevamuktaḥ sa bhṛgurmahātmanā hareṇa viśvārttihareṇa sādaram /
GP12brndp2_u:5590: punaśca natvā vibudhāṃ pati guruṃ kṛpāsamudraṃ samuvāca satvaram // BndP_2,32.36 //
GP12brndp2_u:5593: rāmo nāma jagadvandyaṃ tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // BndP_2,32.37 //
GP12brndp2_u:5595: taṃ prasādhaya viśveśa vāñchitaṃ kāmameva me // BndP_2,32.38 //
GP12brndp2_u:5597: ātithyaṃ kṛtavān deva jamadagniḥ pitā mama // BndP_2,32.39 //
GP12brndp2_u:5599: sā dhenustaṃ mṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā gavāṃ lokaṃ jagāma ha // BndP_2,32.40 //
GP12brndp2_u:5601: jagāma svapuraṃ paścānmātā me prārudadbhṛśam // BndP_2,32.41 //
GP12brndp2_u:5610: ityevaṃ paripūrṇā me karttā devo jagatpatiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5613: ityevaṃ tadvacaḥ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā durgāmukhaṃ haraḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5616: uvāca ca mahārāja bhārgavaṃ vairasādhakam // BndP_2,32.48 //
GP12brndp2_u:5618: triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ kopena sāhasaste mahānbaṭo // BndP_2,32.49 //
GP12brndp2_u:5621: tasmai pradattaṃ dattena śrīhareḥ kavacaṃ purā /
GP12brndp2_u:5622: śaktiratyarthavīryā ca taṃ kathaṃ hantumicchasi // BndP_2,32.51 //
GP12brndp2_u:5624: na cānyaḥ śaṅkarātputra satkāryaṃ karttumīśvaraḥ // BndP_2,32.52 //
GP12brndp2_u:5628: adyaprabhṛti vipra tvaṃ mama skandasamo bhava /
GP12brndp2_u:5629: dāsyāmi mantraṃ divyaṃ te kavacaṃ ca mahāmate // BndP_2,32.54 //
GP12brndp2_u:5631: triḥ saptakṛtvo nirbhūpāṃ mahīṃ cāpi kariṣyasi // BndP_2,32.55 //
GP12brndp2_u:5637: gadāṃ śaktiṃ ca paraśuṃ śūlaṃ daṇḍamanuttamam // BndP_2,32.58 //
GP12brndp2_u:5639: namaskṛtya śivaṃ śāntaṃ durgāṃ skandaṃ gaṇeśvaram // BndP_2,32.59 //
GP12brndp2_u:5641: siddhaṃ kṛtvā śivoktaṃ tu mantraṃ kavacamuttamam // BndP_2,32.60 //
GP12brndp2_u:5643: nihatya kārttavīryaṃ taṃ sasainyaṃ sakulaṃ mudā /
GP12brndp2_u:5644: vinivṛtto gṛhaṃ prāgātpituḥ svasya bhṛgūdvahaḥ // BndP_2,32.61 //
GP12brndp2_u:5645: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde bhārgavacarite dvātriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 32//
GP12brndp2_u:5647: śrutaṃ sarvaṃ muniśreṣṭha kīrtyamānaṃ tvayā vibho /
GP12brndp2_u:5651: mantra ca siddhida śaśvatsādhakānāṃ sukhāvaham // BndP_2,33.2 //
GP12brndp2_u:5657: ṛṣiśchandaśca jagatī devo rājeśvaraḥ svayam // BndP_2,33.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:5659: praṇavo meśiraḥ pātu śrīkṛṣṇāya namaḥ sadā // BndP_2,33.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:5661: kṛṣṇeti pātu netre me kṛṣṇasvāheti tārakām // BndP_2,33.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:5662: haraye nama ityeṣa bhrūlatāṃ pātu me sadā /
GP12brndp2_u:5663: oṃ govindāya svāheti nāsikāṃ pātu saṃtatam // BndP_2,33.8 //
GP12brndp2_u:5664: gopālāya namo gaṇḍaṃ pātu me satataṃ manuḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5665: klīṃ kṛṣṇāya namaḥ karṇauṃ pātu kalpatarurmama // BndP_2,33.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:5666: śrīṃ kṛṣṇāya namaḥ pātu nityaṃ me 'dharayugmakam /
GP12brndp2_u:5667: oṃ gopīśāya svāheti dantapaṅktiṃ mamāvatu // BndP_2,33.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:5669: oṃ śrīkṛṣṇāya svāheti jihvikāṃ pātu me sadā // BndP_2,33.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:5670: rāmeśvarāya svāheti tālukaṃ pātu me sadā /
GP12brndp2_u:5671: rādhikeśāya svāheti kaṇṭhaṃ me pātu sarvadā // BndP_2,33.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:5672: namo gopīgaṇeśāya grīvāṃ me pātu sarvadā /
GP12brndp2_u:5673: oṃ gopeśāya svāheti skandhau pātu sadā mama // BndP_2,33.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:5675: udaraṃ pātu me nityaṃ mukundāya namo manuḥ // BndP_2,33.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:5676: hnīṃ śrīṅklīṅkṛṣṇāya svāhā karau pātu sadā mama /
GP12brndp2_u:5677: oṃ viṣṇave namaḥ svāhā bāhuyugmaṃ mamāvatu // BndP_2,33.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:5680: oṃ hrīṃśrīṃpadmanābhāya nābhiṃ pātu sadā mama /
GP12brndp2_u:5681: oṃ sarveśāya svāheti keśānmama sadāvatu // BndP_2,33.17 //
GP12brndp2_u:5683: oṃ mādhavāya svāheti bhālaṃ me sarvadāvatu // BndP_2,33.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:5685: namo gopījaneśāya ūrū pātu sadā mama // BndP_2,33.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:5691: svayaṃ golokanātho māmāgneyyāṃ diśi rakṣatu // BndP_2,33.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:5693: nairṛtyāṃ pātu māṃ kṛṣṇāḥ paścime pātu māṃ hariḥ // BndP_2,33.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:5695: aiśānyāṃ me sadā pātu vṛndāvanavihāra kṛt // BndP_2,33.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:5697: sadaiva māmadhaḥ pātu balidhvaṃsī mahābalaḥ // BndP_2,33.25 //
GP12brndp2_u:5698: jale sthale cāntarikṣe nṛsiṃhaḥ pātu māṃ sadā /
GP12brndp2_u:5699: svapne jāgaraṇe caiva pātu māṃ mādhavaḥ svayam // BndP_2,33.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:5700: sarvāntarātmā nirliptaḥ pātu māṃ sarvato vibhuḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5701: iti te kathitaṃ bhūpa sarvāghaughavināśanam // BndP_2,33.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:5703: mayā śrutaṃ śivamukhātpravaktavyaṃ na kasyacit // BndP_2,33.28 //
GP12brndp2_u:5705: kaṇṭhe vā dakṣiṇe bāhau so 'pi viṣṇurna saṃśayaḥ // BndP_2,33.29 //
GP12brndp2_u:5707: yadi syātsiddhakavaco jīvanmukto na saṃśayaḥ // BndP_2,33.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:5713: snānaṃ ca sarvatīrtheṣu nāsyārhanti kalāmapi // BndP_2,33.33 //
GP12brndp2_u:5715: yadi syātsiddhakavacaḥ sarvaṃ prāpnoti niścitam // BndP_2,33.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:5717: yo bhavetsiddhakavaco vijayī sa bhaved dhruvam // BndP_2,33.35 //
GP12brndp2_u:5718: rājyaṃ deyaṃ śiro deyaṃ prāṇā deyāśca bhūpate /
GP12brndp2_u:5719: etattu kavacaṃ vatsa na deyaṃ saṃkaṭe 'pi ca // BndP_2,33.36 //
GP12brndp2_u:5722: idaṃ dhṛtvā tu kavacaṃ cakravarttī bhavānbhava // BndP_2,33.37 //
GP12brndp2_u:5723: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde bhārgavacarite trayastriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp2_u:5730: yathā samāpito vīrastanme vistarato vada // BndP_2,34.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:5731: kṛpāpātraṃ sa dattasya rājā rāmaḥ śivasya ca /
GP12brndp2_u:5732: ubhau tau samare vīrau jaghaṭāte kathaṃ guro // BndP_2,34.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:5735: kārttavīryasya bhūpasya rāmasya ca mahātmanaḥ // BndP_2,34.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:5736: sa rāmaḥ kavacaṃ labdhvā mantraṃ caiva gurormukhāt /
GP12brndp2_u:5737: cakāra mādhanaṃ tasya bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ // BndP_2,34.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:5745: gataṃ varṣaśataṃ tatra dhyānayuktasya nityadā // BndP_2,34.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:5746: ekadā tu mahārāja rāmaḥ snātuṃ gato mahān /
GP12brndp2_u:5748: mṛga ekaḥ samāyāto mṛgya yuktaḥ palāyitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5753: ubho tau pibatastatra jalaṃ śaṅkitamānasau // BndP_2,34.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:5755: sa dṛṣṭvā tatra saṃviṣṭaṃ rāmaṃ bhārgavanandanam // BndP_2,34.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:5757: sa cintayāmāsa tadā śaṅkito bhṛgunandanāt // BndP_2,34.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:5762: rāmastu tau mṛgoṃ dṛṣṭvā pibantau sabhyaṃ jalam /
GP12brndp2_u:5764: naivātra vyāghrasenādo na ca vyādho hi dṛśyate /
GP12brndp2_u:5771: śiṣyeṇa saṃyuto rāmo yāvattau cāpi saṃsthitau // BndP_2,34.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:5773: rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahātmānaṃ kathāṃ tau cakraturmudā // BndP_2,34.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:5776: asya vīrasya sāṃnidhye bhayaṃ naivāvayorbhavet // BndP_2,34.25 //
GP12brndp2_u:5778: dṛṣṭamātro hi muninā bhasmībhūto bhaviṣyati // BndP_2,34.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:5780: mṛgaścovāca harṣeṇa samāviṣṭaḥ priyāṃ svakām // BndP_2,34.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:5786: pitaraṃ kārttavīryeṇa dṛṣṭvā caiva tiraskṛtam // BndP_2,34.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:5789: sa brahmā diṣṭavāṃścainaṃ śivalokaṃ vrajeti ha /
GP12brndp2_u:5790: tasya tvājñāṃ samādāya gato 'sau śivasannidhim // BndP_2,34.32 //
GP12brndp2_u:5797: nityaṃ japati dharmātmā kṛṣṇasya kavacaṃ sudhīḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5799: mantra sādhayato bhadre na ca tatsiddhireti hi /
GP12brndp2_u:5800: ātrāsti kāraṇaṃ bhaktiḥ sāva vai trividhā matā // BndP_2,34.37 //
GP12brndp2_u:5802: śivasya nāradasyāpi śukasya ca mahātmanaḥ // BndP_2,34.38 //
GP12brndp2_u:5809: sevate gopikādhīśaṃ tena siddhiṃ na cāgataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5811: ityuktā tvaritaṃ kāntaṃ sā mṛgī hṛṣṭamānasā // BndP_2,34.42 //
GP12brndp2_u:5815: rhadṛg jñānaṃ tava kathaṃ saṃjātaṃ tadvadādhunā // BndP_2,34.43 //
GP12brndp2_u:5817: śṛṇu priye mahābhāge jñānaṃ puṇyena jāyate // BndP_2,34.44 //
GP12brndp2_u:5827: yottamā bhaktirākhyātā tāṃ vinā naiva siddhyati /
GP12brndp2_u:5831: jñātvā ca lapsyate siddhiṃ mantrasya kavacasya ca /
GP12brndp2_u:5836: tataḥ saṃsiddha kavacau rājanaṃ haihayādhipam // BndP_2,34.53 //
GP12brndp2_u:5838: triḥ saptakṛtvo nirbhūpāṃ kariṣyatyavanīṃ priya // BndP_2,34.54 //
GP12brndp2_u:5841: ātmano mṛgabhāvasya kāraṇaṃ jñātavāṃśca ha // BndP_2,34.55 //
GP12brndp2_u:5842: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya
GP12brndp2_u:5847: tvayāpi hi mahābhāga yataḥ śaṃsasi satkathāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5850: punaḥ prapaccha kiṃ nātha tanme vada savistaram // BndP_2,35.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:5853: yathā pṛṣṭaṃ tayā so 'syai varṇayāmāsa tattvavit // BndP_2,35.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:5854: śrutvā tu caritaṃ tasya bhārgavasya mahātmanaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5855: bhūyaḥ prapaccha taṃ kāntaṃ jñānatattvārthamādarāt // BndP_2,35.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:5860: karmaṇā yena saṃprāptāvāvāṃ tiryagjaniṃ prabho // BndP_2,35.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:5861: iti vākyaṃ samākarṇya priyāyāḥ sa mṛgaḥ svayam /
GP12brndp2_u:5864: śṛṇu priye mahābhāge yathā'vāṃ mṛgatāṃ gatau /
GP12brndp2_u:5871: jyeṣṭho rāmo 'nujastasya dhamastasyānu jaḥ pṛthuḥ // BndP_2,35.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:5879: ekadā tu vayaṃ sarve saṃprāptā parvate vane // BndP_2,35.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:5893: śṛṅgaiḥ samullikhantaṃ ca vyoma kautukasaṃ yutam // BndP_2,35.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:5899: nirjharāpāta śirasi pātukāmā jalaṃ priye // BndP_2,35.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:5901: tatra prāpto yadṛcchāto jagṛhe tāṃ bhayarditām // BndP_2,35.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:5904: sā mṛtā tvaṃ mṛgī jātā mṛga stvāhamanusmaran /
GP12brndp2_u:5905: jāto bhadre na jāne vai kva gātā bhrātaro 'grajāḥ // BndP_2,35.29 //
GP12brndp2_u:5907: bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca tathā śṛṇu bhadre vadāmyaham // BndP_2,35.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:5909: rāmasyāsya bhayātso 'pi bhakṣito hariṇā dhunā // BndP_2,35.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:5911: avābhyāṃ tu jalaṃ pītaṃ madhyame puṣkare tviha // BndP_2,35.32 //
GP12brndp2_u:5915: gamiṣyāvaḥ śubhāṃllokānyeṣu gatvā na śocati // BndP_2,35.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:5921: snātvā nityakriyāṃ kṛtvā pratasthe harṣito bhṛśam // BndP_2,35.37 //
GP12brndp2_u:5922: rāmeṇa gacchatā mārge dṛṣṭo vyādho mṛtastadā /
GP12brndp2_u:5925: snātvā mādhyāhnikīṃ sandhyāṃ cakā rātimudānvitaḥ // BndP_2,35.39 //
GP12brndp2_u:5926: hitaṃ tadātmanaḥ proktaṃ mṛgeṇa sa vicārayan /
GP12brndp2_u:5931: vipadgataṃ puṣkaraṃ tu paśyamāno mahāmanāḥ // BndP_2,35.42 //
GP12brndp2_u:5941: tatra praviśya vai rāmo hyakṛtavraṇasaṃyutaḥ // BndP_2,35.47 //
GP12brndp2_u:5943: stimitodasaraḥ prakhyaṃ dhyāyantaṃ brahma śāśvatam // BndP_2,35.48 //
GP12brndp2_u:5945: nanāma ca mahārāja svābhidhānaṃ samuccaran // BndP_2,35.49 //
GP12brndp2_u:5948: ityuktavantaṃ rāmaṃ tu unmīlya nayane śanaiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5951: dadau papraccha kuśalaṃ tapasaśca kulasya ca // BndP_2,35.52 //
GP12brndp2_u:5952: sa pṛṣṭastena vai rāmo ghaṭodbhavamuvāca ha /
GP12brndp2_u:5954: kiṃ tvaṅkaṃ saṃśayaṃ jātaṃ chindhi svavacanāmṛtaiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5955: mṛgaścaiko mayā dṛṣṭo madhyame puṣkare vibho // BndP_2,35.54 //
GP12brndp2_u:5958: pāhi māṃ kṛpayā nātha sādhayanta mahāmanum /
GP12brndp2_u:5959: śivena dattaṃ kavaca mama sādhayato guro // BndP_2,35.56 //
GP12brndp2_u:5960: kṛṣmasya samatīta tu sādhikaṃ hi śaracchatam /
GP12brndp2_u:5961: na ca siddhimavāpto 'haṃ tanme tvaṃ kṛpayā vada // BndP_2,35.57 //
GP12brndp2_u:5964: kṣaṇaṃ dhyātvā mahārāja mṛgoktaṃ jñātavān hṛdā // BndP_2,35.58 //
GP12brndp2_u:5965: mṛgaṃ cāpi samāyātaṃ mṛgyā saha nijāśrame /
GP12brndp2_u:5966: śrotuṃ kṛṣṇāmṛtaṃ stotraṃ sarvaṃ tatkāraṇa muniḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5968: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamabhāge tṛtīya
GP12brndp2_u:5971: avagatya sa vai sarvaṃ kāraṇaṃ prītamānasaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5974: śṛṇu rāma mahābhāga kathayāmi hitaṃ tava /
GP12brndp2_u:5975: mantrasya siddhiṃ yena tvaṃ śīghrameva samāpnuyāḥ // BndP_2,36.2 //
GP12brndp2_u:5977: yo yateta narastasya siddhirbhavati satvaram // BndP_2,36.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:5979: pātālaṃ nāgarācaindraiḥ śobhitaṃ parayā mudā // BndP_2,36.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:5980: tatra dṛṣṭā mahābhāga mayā siddhāḥ samantataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:5983: ete 'nye ca mahāsiddhā vātsyāyanamukhā dvija // BndP_2,36.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:5985: taṃ namaskṛtya nāgaindraiḥ saha siddhairmahātmabhiḥ // BndP_2,36.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:5988: niviṣṭā puratastasya śṛṇvantī tāḥ kathāḥ sadā /
GP12brndp2_u:5989: yadyatpṛcchati sā bhūmiḥ śeṣaṃ sākṣānmahīdharam // BndP_2,36.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:5991: mayā tatra śrutaṃ vatsa kṛṣṇapremāmṛtaṃ śubham // BndP_2,36.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:5995: śrutvā sarvaṃ dharā vatsa pratdṛṣṭā taṃ dharādharam // BndP_2,36.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:6002: tattāni brūhi nāmāni vāsudevasya vāsuke // BndP_2,36.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:6003: nātaḥ parataraṃ puṇyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu vidyate /
GP12brndp2_u:6009: śṛṇu devi pravakṣyāmi nāmnāmaṣṭotaraṃ śatam // BndP_2,36.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:6011: ekāvṛttyā tu kṛṣṇasya nāmaikaṃ tatprayacchati // BndP_2,36.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:6057: kṛṣṇona kṛṣṇabhaktena śrutvā gītāmṛtaṃ purā // BndP_2,36.42 //
GP12brndp2_u:6061: dānaṃ vrataṃ tapastīrthaṃ yatkṛtaṃ tviha janmani // BndP_2,36.44 //
GP12brndp2_u:6065: śiśūnāṃ gokulānāṃ ca puṣṭidaṃ puṇyavarddhanam // BndP_2,36.46 //
GP12brndp2_u:6071: imaṃ mantraṃ mahādevi japanneva divā niśam // BndP_2,36.49 //
GP12brndp2_u:6076: etāvadukto bhāgavānananto mūrttistu saṃkarṣaṇasaṃjñitā vibho // BndP_2,36.51 //
GP12brndp2_u:6077: dharādharo 'laṃ jagatāṃ dharāyai nirdiśya bhūyo virarāma mānadaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6078: tatastu sarve sanakādayo ye samāsthitāstatparitaḥ kathādṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6079: ānanda pūrṇṇaṃbunidhau nimagnāḥ sabhājayāmāsurahīśvaraṃ tam // BndP_2,36.52 //
GP12brndp2_u:6082: dharādharāyāpi kṛpārṇavāya śeṣāya viśvaprabhave namaste // BndP_2,36.53 //
GP12brndp2_u:6083: kṛṣṇāmṛtaṃ naḥ paripāyitaṃ vibho vidhūtapāpā bhavatā kṛtā vayam /
GP12brndp2_u:6084: bhavādṛśā dīnadayālavo vibho samuddharantyeva nijānhi saṃnatān // BndP_2,36.54 //
GP12brndp2_u:6086: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya dharādharādharaṃ sarve vayaṃ svāvasathānupāgatāḥ // BndP_2,36.55 //
GP12brndp2_u:6091: yāvanti mantrajālāni stotrāṇi kavacāni ca // BndP_2,36.58 //
GP12brndp2_u:6100: gatau ca vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ sarva devana maskṛtam /
GP12brndp2_u:6102: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya
GP12brndp2_u:6108: modamāna uvācedaṃ bhārgavaṃ purataḥ sthitam // BndP_2,37.2 //
GP12brndp2_u:6111: hitaṃ vadāmi yatte 'dya tatkuruṣva samāhitaḥ // BndP_2,37.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:6113: padāni yatra dṛśyante nyastāni sumāhātmanā // BndP_2,37.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:6119: śatrūṇāṃ nigrahārthāya tacca te siddhidaṃ bhavet // BndP_2,37.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:6128: jagāma darśanaṃ tasya jāmadagnyasya bhūpate // BndP_2,37.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:6134: praṇamya daṇḍavadbhamau tuṣṭāva prayato vibhum // BndP_2,37.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:6139: taṃ tvāmanirdeśyamacaṃ purāmamanantamīḍe bhava me dayāparaḥ // BndP_2,37.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:6140: yastveka īśo nijavāñcchitaprado dhatte tanūrlokavihāra rakṣaṇe /
GP12brndp2_u:6141: nānā vidhā devamanuṣyatiryagyādaḥ su bhūmerbharavāraṇāya // BndP_2,37.17 //
GP12brndp2_u:6144: yaṃ vai prasannā asurāḥ surā narāḥ sakinnarāstiryakeyonayo 'pi hi /
GP12brndp2_u:6145: gatāḥ svarūpaṃ nikhalaṃ vihāya te dehastryapatyārthamamatvamīśvara // BndP_2,37.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:6146: taṃ devadevaṃ bhajatāmabhīpsitapradaṃ nirīhaṃ guṇavarjitaṃ ca /
GP12brndp2_u:6149: svapne 'pi te rūpamalaukikaṃvibho paśyanti naivārthanibaddhavāsanāḥ // BndP_2,37.21 //
GP12brndp2_u:6150: ye vai tvadīyaṃ caraṇaṃ bhavaśramānnirviṇmacittā vidhivatsmaranti /
GP12brndp2_u:6151: namanti bhaktyātha samarcayanti vai parasparaṃ saṃsadi varṇayanti // BndP_2,37.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:6153: taranti cānyānapi tārayanti hi bhavauṣadhaṃ nāma sudhā taveśa // BndP_2,37.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:6155: ārādhayaṃ nātha bhavānabhijñaḥ kiṃ te ha vijñāpyamihāsti loke // BndP_2,37.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:6157: ityevaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ tu stuvantaṃ praṇataṃ puraḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6160: hanta rāma mahābhāga siddhaṃ te kāryamuttamam /
GP12brndp2_u:6162: hatvā taṃ kārttavīryaṃ hi rājānaṃ dṛptamānasam /
GP12brndp2_u:6163: sādhayitvā piturvairaṃ kuru niḥkṣatriyāṃ mahīm // BndP_2,37.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:6165: kṛtakāryo dvijaśreṣṭa taṃ samāpaya mānada // BndP_2,37.28 //
GP12brndp2_u:6167: cariṣyati yathā kālaṃ karttā harttā svayaṃ prabhuḥ // BndP_2,37.29 //
GP12brndp2_u:6169: rāmo nāma bhaviṣyāmi caturvyūhaḥ sanātanaḥ // BndP_2,37.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:6171: tadā kauśikayajñaṃ tu sādhayitvā salakṣmaṇaḥ // BndP_2,37.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:6174: tadā yāsyannayodhyāṃ te hariṣye teja unmadam /
GP12brndp2_u:6178: iti śrībrahāmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya
GP12brndp2_u:6185: yatra pāpaharā puṇyā narmadā saritāṃ varā /
GP12brndp2_u:6186: punāti darśanādeva prāṇinaḥ pāpino hyapi // BndP_2,38.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:6188: tripurasya vināśāya kṛto yatno mahīpate // BndP_2,38.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:6189: tatra kiṃ varṇyate puṇyaṃ nṛṇāṃ devasvarūpiṇām /
GP12brndp2_u:6190: sadṛṣṭvā narmadāṃ bhūpa bhargavaḥ kulanandanaḥ // BndP_2,38.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:6193: kṣipraṃ nāśaya śatrūnme varadā bhava śobhane /
GP12brndp2_u:6194: ityevaṃ sa namaskṛtya narmadāṃ pāpanāśinīm // BndP_2,38.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:6196: dūta rājātvayā vācyo yadahaṃ vacmi te 'nagha // BndP_2,38.8 //
GP12brndp2_u:6197: na saṃdehastvayā kāryo dūtaḥ kvāpi na badhyate /
GP12brndp2_u:6198: yadbalaṃ tu samāśritya jamadagnimuniṃ nṛpaḥ // BndP_2,38.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:6200: śīghraṃ nirgaccha mandātmanyuddhaṃ rāmāya dehi tat // BndP_2,38.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:6201: bhārgavaṃ tvaṃ samāsādya gaccha lokāntaraṃ tvarā /
GP12brndp2_u:6202: ityevamuktvā rājānaṃ śrutvā tasya vacastathā // BndP_2,38.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:6203: śīghramāgaccha bhadraṃ te vilaṃbo neha śasyate /
GP12brndp2_u:6211: tadbalaṃ mayi vartteta yuddhaṃ dāsye tavādhunā // BndP_2,38.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:6213: senādhyakṣaṃ samāhūya provāca vadatāṃ varaḥ // BndP_2,38.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:6214: sajjaṃ kuru mahābhāga sainyaṃ me vīrasaṃmataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6215: yotsye rāmeṇa bhṛguṇā vilaṃbo mā bhavatviti // BndP_2,38.17 //
GP12brndp2_u:6217: sainyaṃ sajjaṃ vidhāyāśu caturaṅga nyavedayat // BndP_2,38.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:6218: sainyaṃ sajjaṃ samākarṇya kārttavīryo nṛpo mudā /
GP12brndp2_u:6235: yadā pracalitaṃ sainyaṃ kārttavīryārjunasya vai // BndP_2,38.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:6236: tadā prācchāditaṃ vyoma rajasā ca diśo daśa /
GP12brndp2_u:6239: mārge dadarśa rājendro viparītāni bhūpate // BndP_2,38.29 //
GP12brndp2_u:6241: muktakeśāṃ chinnanāsāṃ rudatīṃ ca digaṃbarām // BndP_2,38.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:6243: kucailaṃ patitaṃ bhagnaṃ nagnaṃ kāṣāyavāsasam // BndP_2,38.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:6245: godhāṃ ca śaśakaṃ śalyaṃ riktakumbhaṃ sarīmṛpam // BndP_2,38.32 //
GP12brndp2_u:6247: svadakṣiṇe śṛgālaṃ ca kurvantaṃ bhairvaṃ ravam // BndP_2,38.33 //
GP12brndp2_u:6248: rogiṇaṃ puṃlkasaṃ caiva vṛṣaṃ ca śyenabhallukau /
GP12brndp2_u:6249: dṛṣṭvāpi prayayau yoddhuṃ kālapāśāvṛto hajhāt // BndP_2,38.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:6258: dṛṣṭvā samudyataṃ rāmaṃ sainikānāṃ vadhāya ca /
GP12brndp2_u:6259: cakaṃpire bhṛśaṃ sarve mṛtyoriva śarīriṇaḥ // BndP_2,38.39 //
GP12brndp2_u:6260: sa yatra yatrānilaraṃhasaṃ bhṛguścikṣepa roṣeṇa yutaḥ paraśvadham /
GP12brndp2_u:6261: tatastataśchinnabhujorukaṅgharā nāgā hayāḥ śūranarā nipetuḥ // BndP_2,38.40 //
GP12brndp2_u:6262: yathā gajendro madayuksamantato nālaṃ vanaṃ bharddayati pradhāvan /
GP12brndp2_u:6263: tathaiva rāmo 'pi manonilaujā vimarddayāmāsa nṛpasya senām // BndP_2,38.41 //
GP12brndp2_u:6264: dṛṣṭvā tamitthaṃ praharantamojasā rāmaṃ raṇe śastrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭham /
GP12brndp2_u:6265: udyamya cāpaṃ mahadāsthito rathaṃ sṛjyaṃ ca kṛtvā kilamansyarājaḥ // BndP_2,38.42 //
GP12brndp2_u:6267: dṛṣṭvā tamāyāntamatho mahātmā rāmo gṛhītvā dhanuṣaṃ mahogram // BndP_2,38.43 //
GP12brndp2_u:6269: sa cāpi rājātibalo manasvī sasarja rāmāya tu parvatāstram // BndP_2,38.44 //
GP12brndp2_u:6271: rāmo 'pi tatrātibalaṃ viditvā taṃ matsyarājaṃ vividhāstrapūgaiḥ // BndP_2,38.45 //
GP12brndp2_u:6273: nārāyaṇāstre bhṛguṇā prayukte rāmeṇa rājannṛpatervadhāya // BndP_2,38.46 //
GP12brndp2_u:6274: diśastu sarvāḥ subhṛśaṃ hi tejasā prajajvalurmatsyapatiścakaṃpe /
GP12brndp2_u:6275: rāmastu tasyātha vilakṣya kampaṃ bāṇaiścaturbhirnijaghāna vāhān // BndP_2,38.47 //
GP12brndp2_u:6276: śareṇa caikena dhvajaṃ mahātmā ciccheda cāpaṃ ca śaradvayena /
GP12brndp2_u:6277: bāṇena caikena prasahya sārathiṃ nipātya bhūmau rathamārddayattribhiḥ // BndP_2,38.48 //
GP12brndp2_u:6278: tyaktvā rathaṃ bhūmigataṃ ca maṅgalaṃ paraśvadhenāśu jaghāna mūrddhani /
GP12brndp2_u:6279: sa bhinnaśīrṣo rudhiraṃ vamanmuhurmarcchāmavāpyātha mamāra ca kṣaṇāt // BndP_2,38.49 //
GP12brndp2_u:6283: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyama bhāge tṛtīya
GP12brndp2_u:6295: tadastraṃ bhārgave dreṇa kṣiptaṃ saṃgrāmamūrddhani // BndP_2,39.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:6297: tataḥ kruddho mahābhāgo rāmaḥ śatruvidāraṇaḥ // BndP_2,39.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:6299: bṛhadbalaṃ ca gadayā vidarbhaṃ muṣṭinā tathā // BndP_2,39.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:6303: dudrāva kārttavīryaṃ ca jāmadagnyo mahābalaḥ // BndP_2,39.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:6305: kāryyākāryavidhānajñāḥ pṛṣṭe kṛtvā ca haihayam // BndP_2,39.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:6310: na cādṛśyata rājendra tadā sa tvakṛtavraṇaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6311: sasmāra rāmacaritaṃ yaduktaṃ hariṇena vai // BndP_2,39.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:6313: etasminneva kāle tu rāmaḥ śastrāstrakovidaḥ // BndP_2,39.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:6316: trirātraṃ samare rāmastaiḥ sārddhaṃ yuyudhe balī /
GP12brndp2_u:6325: teḥ prayuktāni śastrāṇi mahāstrāṇi ca bhūpate // BndP_2,39.20 //
GP12brndp2_u:6329: karṣakastu yathā kṣetre pakvaṃ dhānyaṃ tathā tṛṇam // BndP_2,39.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:6335: rāmo 'smai yāni śastrāṇi cikṣepāstrāṇi cāpi hi // BndP_2,39.25 //
GP12brndp2_u:6336: tāni sarvāṇi ciccheda sucandro yuddha paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6337: tataḥ kruddho raṇe rāmaḥ sucandraṃ pṛthivīśvaram // BndP_2,39.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:6341: hṛṣṭottīrya rathātsadyaḥ sucandraḥ praṇanāma ha // BndP_2,39.28 //
GP12brndp2_u:6343: tamevaṃ praṇataṃ tyaktvā yathau nārāyamantikam // BndP_2,39.29 //
GP12brndp2_u:6345: dṛṣṭvā vyarthaṃ mahāstraṃ tadbhūpaṃ svasthaṃ vilokya ca // BndP_2,39.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:6346: rāmaḥ śaktiṃ ca musalaṃ tomaraṃ paṭṭiśaṃ tathā /
GP12brndp2_u:6347: gadāṃ ca paraśuṃ kopācchikṣepa nṛpamūrddhani // BndP_2,39.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:6348: jagrāha tāni sarvāṇi sucandro līlayaiva hi /
GP12brndp2_u:6349: cikṣepa śivaśūlaṃ ca rāmo nṛpataye yadā // BndP_2,39.32 //
GP12brndp2_u:6351: dadarśa ca purastasya bhadrakālīṃ jagatprasūm // BndP_2,39.33 //
GP12brndp2_u:6353: siṃhasthāṃ ca trinetrāṃ ca triśūlavaradhāriṇīm // BndP_2,39.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:6356: namostu te śaṅkaravallabhāyai jagatsavitryai samalaṅkṛtāyai // BndP_2,39.35 //
GP12brndp2_u:6372: namo namaste parataḥ purastāt pārśvādharordhvaṃ ca namo namaste // BndP_2,39.43 //
GP12brndp2_u:6373: sadā ca sarvatra namo namaste namo namaste 'khilavigrahāyai /
GP12brndp2_u:6374: prasīda deveśi mama pratijñāṃ purā kṛtāṃ pālaya bhadrakāli // BndP_2,39.44 //
GP12brndp2_u:6375: tvameva mātā ca pitā tvameva jagattrayasyāpi namo namaste /
GP12brndp2_u:6377: evaṃ stutā tadā devī bhadrakālī tarasvinī // BndP_2,39.45 //
GP12brndp2_u:6380: vatsa rāma mahābhāga prītāsmi tava sāṃpratam // BndP_2,39.46 //
GP12brndp2_u:6381: varaṃ varaya matto yastvayā cābhyarthitā hṛdi /
GP12brndp2_u:6383: mātaryadi varo deyastvayā me bhaktava tsale // BndP_2,39.47 //
GP12brndp2_u:6385: iti me 'bhihitaṃ devi kuru prītena cetasā // BndP_2,39.48 //
GP12brndp2_u:6388: āgneyāstreṇa rājendraṃ sucandraṃ naya madgṛham // BndP_2,39.49 //
GP12brndp2_u:6391: ityuktamākarṇya sa bhārgavendro devyāḥ priyaṃ kartumathodyato 'bhūt // BndP_2,39.50 //
GP12brndp2_u:6392: prāṇānniyamyācamanaṃ ca kṛtvā sucandramuddiśya ca tatsamādadhe /
GP12brndp2_u:6393: astraṃ prayuktaṃ nṛpatervadhāya rāmeṇa rājan prasabhaṃ tadā tat // BndP_2,39.51 //
GP12brndp2_u:6394: dagdhvā vapurbhūtamayaṃ tadīyaṃ nināya lokaṃ paradevatāyāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6395: tatastu rāmeṇa kṛtapraṇāmā sā bhadrakālo jagadādikartrī // BndP_2,39.52 //
GP12brndp2_u:6397: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya
GP12brndp2_u:6408: dṛṣṭvā taṃ puṣkārākṣaṃ tu sucandratanayaṃ tadā /
GP12brndp2_u:6411: tato meghāḥ samutpannā garjanto bhairavānnavān // BndP_2,40.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:6414: tena te 'darśanaṃ nītāḥ sadya eva balāhakāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:6415: atha rāmo bhṛśaṃ kruddho brāhmaṃ tatrābhisaṃdadhe // BndP_2,40.8 //
GP12brndp2_u:6417: brāhma so 'pyāhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā daṇḍāhata ivāragaḥ // BndP_2,40.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:6421: ekaikena ca bāṇena hṛdi śīrṣe bhujadvaye // BndP_2,40.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:6422: śikhāyāṃ ca kramādbhittvā tastaṃbha bhṛśa māturam /
GP12brndp2_u:6423: sa caivaṃ pīḍīto rāmaḥ puṣkarākṣeṇa saṃyuge // BndP_2,40.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:6426: patite śakale bhūmau tatkālaṃ paśyatā nṛṇām /
GP12brndp2_u:6427: āścaryaṃ sumāhajjātaṃ divi caiva divau kasām // BndP_2,40.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:6430: yato yato dhāvati bhārgavendro mano 'nilaujāḥ praharanparaśvadham /
GP12brndp2_u:6431: tatastato vājirathebhamānavā nikṛttagātrāḥ śataśo nipetuḥ // BndP_2,40.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:6432: rāmeṇa tatrā tibalena saṃgare nihanyamānāstu paraśvadhena /
GP12brndp2_u:6433: hā tāta mātastviti jalpamāṃnā bhasmībabhūvuḥ suvicūrṇitāstadā // BndP_2,40.17 //
GP12brndp2_u:6434: muhūrttamātreṇa ca bhārgaveṇa tatpuṣkarākṣasya balaṃ samagram /
GP12brndp2_u:6435: anekarājanyakulaṃ hateśvaraṃ itaṃ navākṣauhiṇikaṃ bhṛśāturam // BndP_2,40.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:6443: senāḥ saṃvyūhya saṃtasthuḥ saṃgrāme piturājñayā // BndP_2,40.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:6447: jagrā ha bhārgavendrasya samare jetumudyataḥ // BndP_2,40.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:6449: yathā balāhako vīra parvatopari varṣati // BndP_2,40.25 //
GP12brndp2_u:6457: tato vyomni sadā sakte dve cāpya stre narādhipa // BndP_2,40.29 //

GP12brndp2_u:7809: bhavantu te durācārāḥ kṣipraṃ yāsyanti saṃkṣayam /

GP12brndp2_u:7813: taṃ praṇamya tato jagmuḥ pratītāgnidivaṃ prati /

GP12brndp2_u:7844: rakṣyamāṇo 'pi paśyadbhiḥ kenāpi turago hṛtaḥ // BndP_2,53.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:7848: turageṇa vinā satyaṃ nehāga manamasti vaḥ // BndP_2,53.8 //

GP12brndp2_u:7852: na cāpi dṛśyate vājī tadvārttāpi na kutracit // BndP_2,53.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:7854: vibhajya ravātvā pātālaṃ viviśāma turaṅgamam // BndP_2,53.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:7855: iti kṛtvā matiṃ sarve sāgarāḥ krūraniścayāḥ /

GP12brndp2_u:7881: taṃ prākṛtavadāsīnaṃ te sarve hatavuddhayaḥ // BndP_2,53.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:7905: mahīrajobhiśca nitāntamuddhataiḥ samāvṛtaṃ loka mabhūdbhṛśāturam // BndP_2,53.36 //
GP12brndp2_u:7907: śikhābhirurvīśasutānaśeṣato dadāha sadyaḥ sura vidviṣastān // BndP_2,53.37 //
GP12brndp2_u:7911: jajvaluḥ sahasā dāve taravo nīrasā iva // BndP_2,53.39 //
GP12brndp2_u:7921: iha kṛtvāśubhaṃ karma kaḥpumānvindate sukham // BndP_2,53.44 //
GP12brndp2_u:7923: brahmadaṇḍahatāḥ pāpā nirayaṃ śāśvatīḥ samāḥ // BndP_2,53.45 //
GP12brndp2_u:7938: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamābhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde sagaracaritesāgarāvināśo nāma tripañcaśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 53//

GP12brndp2_u:7958: kenāpya lakṣitaḥ kvāpi nīto vidhivaśāddivi // BndP_2,54.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:7960: prālabhanta na te kvāpi tatpravṛttiṃ cirānnṛpa // BndP_2,54.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:7964: samīpe tasya yogīndraṃ kapilaṃ camahāmunim // BndP_2,54.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:7970: yataste tena rājendra na śokaṃ kartumarhasi // BndP_2,54.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:7971: sa tvaṃ dhairyadhano bhūtvā bhavita vyatayātmanaḥ /

GP12brndp2_u:7976: kṣaṇena paśyatāṃ teṣāṃ nārado 'ntardadhe muniḥ // BndP_2,54.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:7982: labhate hṛdi cecchokaḥ prāptaṃ dhīra tayā phalam // BndP_2,54.21 //
GP12brndp2_u:7986: dhṛtiṃ sattvaṃ samālaṃbya tatheti pratyabhāṣata // BndP_2,54.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:7990: patitāḥ pāpakarmāṇo niraye śāśvatīḥ samāḥ // BndP_2,54.25 //
GP12brndp2_u:7992: tvadāyattamaśeṣaṃ me śreyo 'mutra paratra ca // BndP_2,54.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:8003: kopaṃ ca saṃhara kṣipraṃ lokaprakṣayakārakam // BndP_2,54.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:8012: iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā yogīndrapravaro muniḥ // BndP_2,54.35 //
GP12brndp2_u:8014: svāgataṃ bhavato vatsa diṣṭyā ca tvamihāgataḥ // BndP_2,54.36 //
GP12brndp2_u:8017: vriyatāṃ ca varo mattastvayā yaste manogataḥ /

GP12brndp2_u:8022: varaṃ dadāsi cenmahyaṃ varaye tvāṃ mahāmune // BndP_2,54.40 //
GP12brndp2_u:8026: brahmadaṇḍahatānāṃ tu na hi piṇḍodakakriyāḥ // BndP_2,54.42 //
GP12brndp2_u:8028: vidyate pitṛsālokyaṃ na khalu śruticoditam // BndP_2,54.43 //
GP12brndp2_u:8032: yenoddhāraṇameteṣāṃ vahneḥ kopasya vai bhavet // BndP_2,54.45 //

GP12brndp2_u:8040: āneṣyati divo gaṅgāṃ tapastaptvā mahāddhruvam // BndP_2,54.49 //
GP12brndp2_u:8042: prāpnuvanti gatiṃ svarge bhavataḥ pitaro 'khilāḥ // BndP_2,54.50 //
GP12brndp2_u:8047: tasmāttvaṃ gaccha bhadraṃ te naśokaṃ karttumarhasi /
GP12brndp2_u:8050: tataḥ praṇamya taṃ bhaktyā tathetyuktvā mahāmatiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:8052: sagaraṃ sa samāsādya taṃ praṇamya yathākramam /
GP12brndp2_u:8056: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde kapilāśramasthāśvānayanaṃ nāma catuṣpañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 54//
GP12brndp2_u:8063: susamṛddhaṃ yathāśāstraṃ yajñe sarvaṃ babhūva ha // BndP_2,55.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:8064: evaṃ pravarttitaṃ yajñamṛtvijaḥ sarva eva te /
GP12brndp2_u:8066: samāpayitvā taṃ yajñaṃ rājā vidhividāṃ varaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:8067: yathāvaddakṣiṇāṃ caiva ṛtvijāṃ pradadau tadā // BndP_2,55.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:8077: sa gatvā sarayūtīraṃ yathāśāśtraṃ yathāvidhi // BndP_2,55.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:8079: evaṃ snātvā sapatnīkaḥ suhṛdbhirbrāhmaṇaiḥ saha // BndP_2,55.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:8095: sabhāyāṃ rājaśārdūlo reme śakra ivāparaḥ // BndP_2,55.20 //
GP12brndp2_u:8097: sagaraḥ saha bhāryābhyāṃ reme nṛpavarottamaḥ // BndP_2,55.21 //
GP12brndp2_u:8110: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamābhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde sāgaropākhyāneśumato rājyaprāptirnāma pañcapañcaśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ //
GP12brndp2_u:8117: yojanānāṃ sahasraṃ tu khātvāṣṭau vinipātitāḥ // BndP_2,56.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:8127: vasaṃti siddhasaṃghāśca kṣetre tasminpurā nṛpa // BndP_2,56.8 //
GP12brndp2_u:8133: devyā ca sakalairdevairnityaṃ vasati śaṅkaraḥ // BndP_2,56.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:8139: nṛṇāṃ saṃjāyate rājannānyathā tu kathañcana // BndP_2,56.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:8141: mriyante nṛpa sadyaste svargaṃ prāpsyanti śāśvatam // BndP_2,56.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:8145: siddhikāmā vasaṃti sma munayastatra kecana // BndP_2,56.17 //
GP12brndp2_u:8149: vasaṃti tasminye te hi siddhiṃ prāpsyantyabhīpsitām // BndP_2,56.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:8155: vasaṃtastatra te sarve saṃpradhārya parasparam // BndP_2,56.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:8165: kena vāpi prakāreṇa brahmannetadvadasva me // BndP_2,56.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:8171: babhūva bhuvidharmātmā dilīpa iti viśrutaḥ // BndP_2,56.29 //
GP12brndp2_u:8173: vanaṃ jagāma medhāvī tapase dhṛtamānasaḥ // BndP_2,56.30 //
GP12brndp2_u:8178: rājye 'bhiṣicya taṃ rājā dilīpo 'pi vanaṃ yayau /
GP12brndp2_u:8181: sa śuśrāvātmanaḥ pūrvaṃ pūrvajānāṃ mahīpatiḥ // BndP_2,56.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:8184: rājye bandhuṣu bhoge vā nirvedaṃ paramaṃ yayau /
GP12brndp2_u:8185: sa mantripravare rājyaṃ vinyasya tapase vanam // BndP_2,56.36 //
GP12brndp2_u:8189: tato gaṅgāṃ mahārāja samārādhya prasādya ca // BndP_2,56.38 //
GP12brndp2_u:8192: sa cāpi tadvaraṃ tasmai pradadau bhaktavatsalaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:8193: merormūrdhnastato gaṅgāṃ pataṃ tī śirasātmanaḥ // BndP_2,56.40 //
GP12brndp2_u:8199: sa tāṃ śarvaprasādena labdhvā tu bhuvamāgatām // BndP_2,56.43 //
GP12brndp2_u:8200: āninye sāgarā dagdhā yatra tāṃ vai diśaṃ prati /
GP12brndp2_u:8203: sa tu rājaṛṣiḥ kruddho yajñavāṭe 'khile tayā // BndP_2,56.45 //
GP12brndp2_u:8205: atandrito varṣaśataṃ śuśrūṣitavā sa taṃ punaḥ // BndP_2,56.46 //
GP12brndp2_u:8213: evaṃ sā sāgarānsarvāndivaṃ nītvā mahāndī // BndP_2,56.50 //
GP12brndp2_u:8224: gokarṇamiti ca kṣetraṃ pūrvaṃ proktaṃ tu yattava /
GP12brndp2_u:8228: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamābhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde gaṅgānayanaṃ nāma ṣaṭpañcaśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp2_u:8241: śiṣyaiḥ parivṛtaṃ śāntaṃ dadṛśuste tapodhanāḥ // BndP_2,57.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:8250: svāgataṃ vo mahābhāgā yūyaṃ sarve samāgatāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:8259: tasmātkartumaśakyaṃ te trailokye 'pi na kiñcana // BndP_2,57.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:8266: karaṇīyaṃ ca vaḥ kṛtyaṃ mayā nātra vicāraṇā // BndP_2,57.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:8267: kiṃ tu yuṣmadabhipretaṃ karma loke sudāruṇam /
GP12brndp2_u:8270: tapaḥ samāsthitaścartu prāgeva pitṛ śāsanāt // BndP_2,57.20 //
GP12brndp2_u:8272: pratiśrutya satāṃ madhye tapaḥ karttumihānaghāḥ // BndP_2,57.21 //
GP12brndp2_u:8274: kiṅkarttavyaṃ mayātreti mama ḍolāyate manaḥ // BndP_2,57.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:8279: dharma eva mahāṃstena caritaste bhaviṣyati // BndP_2,57.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:8283: sa taiḥ saha muniśreṣṭho diśaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimām /
GP12brndp2_u:8286: tatparaṃ saritāṃ patyustīraṃ prāpa mahāmanāḥ // BndP_2,57.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:8305: iti śrutvāpi tadvākyaṃ varuṇo yādasāṃ patiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:8308: na dadau darśanaṃ tasmai prativācyaṃ ca nābhyadhāt // BndP_2,57.38 //
GP12brndp2_u:8312: cukopa tamabhiprekṣya rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ // BndP_2,57.40 //
GP12brndp2_u:8316: tataḥ praṇamya manasā śarvaṃ rāmo mahāddhanuḥ // BndP_2,57.42 //
GP12brndp2_u:8348: jājvalyamānavapuṣaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasā bhayāt // BndP_2,57.58 //
GP12brndp2_u:8358: trāsarāsaṃ ca vipulamaṃbhasā plavatā saha // BndP_2,57.63 //
GP12brndp2_u:8380: rakṣa māṃ bhṛguśārdūla kṛpayā śaraṇāgatam // BndP_2,57.74 //
GP12brndp2_u:8382: sthito 'smi tava nirdeśeśādhi kiṃ karavāṇi vai // BndP_2,57.75 //
GP12brndp2_u:8383: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe madhyamabhāge tṛtīye upoddhātapāde bhārgavaṃ prati varuṇāgamanaṃ nāma saptapañcaśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 57//
GP12brndp2_u:8385: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ varuṇaṃ vilokya patitaṃ bhuvi /
GP12brndp2_u:8398: dātumarhati tatkṣetrameṣāṃ toye ca pūrvavat // BndP_2,58.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:8400: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā varuṇo yādasāṃ patiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:8404: tathā hi me varo dattaḥ purānena viriñcinā // BndP_2,58.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:8406: kātaraṃ samupāyāto vaśatāṃ tava bhārgava // BndP_2,58.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:8408: kathaṃ na kuryāṃ karmedamahaṃ kṣattrakulāntaka // BndP_2,58.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:8411: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā tathetyuktvā sa sāyakam /
GP12brndp2_u:8431: vyasmayanta surāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā rāmasya vikramam /
GP12brndp2_u:8434: tatra daivāttathā sthānānnimnatvātsa pralakṣya tu // BndP_2,58.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:8442: paricaṅkramya tāṃ bhūmiṃ yatnena mahātānvitāḥ // BndP_2,58.28 //
GP12brndp2_u:8449: evaṃ rāmeṇa jaladheḥ punaḥ sṛṣṭā vasuṃdharā /
GP12brndp2_u:8452: kṛtaṃ rāmeṇa mahatā na tu sajjaṃ mahaddhanuḥ // BndP_2,58.33 //
GP12brndp2_u:8454: yasya putrairayaṃ khaṇḍo bhārato 'bdhau nipatitaḥ // BndP_2,58.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:8456: rāmeṇābhūtpunaḥ sṛṣṭaṃ yojanānāṃ tu ṣaṭśatam // BndP_2,58.35 //
GP12brndp2_u:8461: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokta madhyamabhāge tṛtīya upāddhātapāde 'ṣṭapañcaśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 58//
GP12brndp2_u:8467: sthitiṃ caiṣāṃ prabhāvaṃ ca brūhi naḥ paripṛcchatām // BndP_2,59.2 //
GP12brndp2_u:8471: bruvato me nibodhaṃśca ṛṣirāha yathā mama // BndP_2,59.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:8473: sthitiṃ caiṣāṃ prabhāvaṃ ca kramato me nibodhata // BndP_2,59.5 //
GP12brndp2_u:8475: tasyāḥ putrau kalirvaidyaḥ stutā ca surasuṃdarī // BndP_2,59.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:8480: kaliḥ surāyāḥ saṃjñeyastasya putro madaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:8481: smṛtā hiṃsā kalerbhāryā śreṣṭhā yā nikṛtasmṛtiḥ // BndP_2,59.9 //
GP12brndp2_u:8487: revatī vidhamasyāpi tayoḥ putrāḥ sahasraśaḥ // BndP_2,59.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:8488: nākasya śakuniḥ patnī vighnasya ca ayo mukhī /
GP12brndp2_u:8491: grahaste rākṣasāḥ sarve bālānāṃ tu viśeṣataḥ // BndP_2,59.14 //
GP12brndp2_u:8495: prabhāsasya tu sā bhāryā vasūnāmaṣṭamasya ca // BndP_2,59.16 //
GP12brndp2_u:8497: tvaṣṭā virājo rūpāṇi dharmapautra udāradhīḥ // BndP_2,59.17 //
GP12brndp2_u:8499: yaḥsarveṣāṃ vimānāni devatānāṃ cakāra ha // BndP_2,59.18 //
GP12brndp2_u:8501: prahrādī viśrutā tasya patnī tvaṣṭurvirocanā // BndP_2,59.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:8505: sureṇuriti vikhyātā svasā tasya yavīyasī // BndP_2,59.21 //
GP12brndp2_u:8506: tvāṣṭrī yā saviturbhāryā punaḥ saṃjñeti viśrutā /
GP12brndp2_u:8507: prāsūta sā mahābhāgaṃ manuṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ vivasvataḥ // BndP_2,59.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:8508: yamau prāsūta ca punaryamaṃ ca yamunāṃ ca ha /
GP12brndp2_u:8509: sā tu gatvā kurūndevī vaḍavā rūpadhāriṇī // BndP_2,59.23 //
GP12brndp2_u:8510: savituścāsya rūpasya nāsikābhyāṃ tu tau smṛtau /
GP12brndp2_u:8511: prāsūta sā mahābhāga tvantarikṣe 'śvinau kila // BndP_2,59.24 //
GP12brndp2_u:8516: etadveditumicchāmo sarvaṃ no brūhi pṛcchatām // BndP_2,59.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:8519: garbhavadhaṃ bhrāntaḥ kaśyapo vidruto bhavet // BndP_2,59.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:8527: vijajñe saviturbhāryā saṃjñā putrāṃstu trīnpunaḥ // BndP_2,59.31 //
GP12brndp2_u:8528: manuṃ yamīṃ yamaṃ caiva chāyā sā tapatī tathā /
GP12brndp2_u:8531: tasya saṃjñābhavadbhāryā tvāṣṭrī devī vivasvataḥ // BndP_2,59.33 //
GP12brndp2_u:8533: sā tu bhāryā bhagavato mārttaṇḍasyātitejasaḥ // BndP_2,59.34 //
GP12brndp2_u:8534: na khalvaye mṛto hyaṇḍe iti snehāttamabravīt /
GP12brndp2_u:8535: ajānankaśyapaḥ snehāt mārttaṇḍa iti cocyate // BndP_2,59.35 //
GP12brndp2_u:8539: dvau sutau tu mahāvīryauṃ kanyaikā viditaiva ca // BndP_2,59.37 //
GP12brndp2_u:8541: tato yamo yamī caiva yamajau saṃbabhūvatuḥ // BndP_2,59.38 //
GP12brndp2_u:8543: asahantī svakāṃ chāyāṃ savarṇāṃ nirmame punaḥ // BndP_2,59.39 //
GP12brndp2_u:8545: prāñjaliḥ prayatā bhūtvā punaḥ saṃjñāmabhāṣata // BndP_2,59.40 //
GP12brndp2_u:8546: vadasva kiṃ mayā kāryaṃ sā saṃjñā tāmathābravīt /
GP12brndp2_u:8547: ahaṃ yāsyāpi bhadraṃ te svameva bhavanaṃ pituḥ // BndP_2,59.41 //
GP12brndp2_u:8549: imau ca bālakau mahyaṃ kanyā ca varavarṇinī // BndP_2,59.42 //
GP12brndp2_u:8551: imau ca bālakau mahyaṃ tathetyuktā tathā ca sā // BndP_2,59.43 //
GP12brndp2_u:8553: pitā tāmāgatāṃ dṛṣṭvā kruddhaḥ saṃjñāmathābravīt // BndP_2,59.44 //
GP12brndp2_u:8554: bharttuḥ samīpaṃ gaccheti niyuktā ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:8557: dvitīyāyāṃ tu saṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñeyamiti cintya tām // BndP_2,59.46 //
GP12brndp2_u:8559: pūrvajasya manostulyau sādṛśyena tu tau prabhū // BndP_2,59.47 //
GP12brndp2_u:8561: śrutakarmā tu vijñeyo graho vai yaḥ śanaiścaraḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:8563: saṃjñā tu pārthivī sā vai svasya putrasya vai tadā /
GP12brndp2_u:8564: cakārābhyadhikaṃ snehaṃ ta tathā pūrvajeṣu vai // BndP_2,59.50 //
GP12brndp2_u:8567: tāṃ vai roṣācca bālācca bhāvinor'thasya vai balāt /
GP12brndp2_u:8568: yadā saṃtarjayāmāsa cchāyāṃ vaivasvato yamaḥ // BndP_2,59.52 //
GP12brndp2_u:8572: yamastu tena śāpena bhṛśaṃ pīḍitamānasaḥ // BndP_2,59.54 //
GP12brndp2_u:8573: manunā saha dharmātmā pituḥ sarvaṃ nyavedayat /
GP12brndp2_u:8575: tasyāṃ mayodyataḥ pādo na tu dehe nipātitaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:8582: na śakyametanmithya tu karttuṃ māturvacastava // BndP_2,59.59 //
GP12brndp2_u:8583: kṛmayo māṃsamādāya yāsyanti ca mahīṃ tava /
GP12brndp2_u:8584: tataḥ pādaṃ mahāprājña punaḥ sāṃprāpsyase sukham // BndP_2,59.60 //
GP12brndp2_u:8586: śāpasya parihāreṇa tvaṃ ca trāto bhaviṣyasi // BndP_2,59.61 //
GP12brndp2_u:8592: sā tatsarvaṃ yathā tattvamācacakṣe vivasvataḥ // BndP_2,59.64 //
GP12brndp2_u:8594: tvaṣṭā tu taṃ yathānyāyamarcayitvā vibhāvasum // BndP_2,59.65 //
GP12brndp2_u:8596: tavātitejasā yuktamidaṃ rūpaṃ na śobhate // BndP_2,59.66 //
GP12brndp2_u:8597: asahantī tu tatsaṃjñā vane carati śādvale /
GP12brndp2_u:8598: drakṣyate tāṃ bhavanadya svāṃ bhāryāṃ śubhacāriṇīm // BndP_2,59.67 //
GP12brndp2_u:8600: anukūlaṃ bhavedevaṃ yadi syātsamayo mataḥ // BndP_2,59.68 //
GP12brndp2_u:8603: tenāsau pīḍitā devī rūpeṇa tu divaspateḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:8604: tasmātte samacakraṃ tu vartate rūpamadbhutam // BndP_2,59.70 //
GP12brndp2_u:8608: taṃ nirmūlita tejaskaṃ tejasāpahṛtena tu // BndP_2,59.72 //
GP12brndp2_u:8610: dadarśa yogamāsthāya svāṃ bhāryāṃ vaḍavāṃ tathā // BndP_2,59.73 //
GP12brndp2_u:8614: sā taṃ niḥsārayāmāsa nobhyāṃ śukraṃ vivasvataḥ // BndP_2,59.75 //
GP12brndp2_u:8618: tāṃ tu rūpeṇa kāntena darśayāmāsa bhāskaraḥ // BndP_2,59.77 //
GP12brndp2_u:8619: sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā bhāryāṃ tuto ṣaitāmuvāca ha /
GP12brndp2_u:8620: yamastu tena śāpena bhṛśaṃ pīḍitamānasaḥ // BndP_2,59.78 //
GP12brndp2_u:8622: so 'labhatkarmaṇāṃ tena śubhena paramāṃ dyutim // BndP_2,59.79 //
GP12brndp2_u:8624: manuḥ prajāpatistveṣa sāvarṇiḥ sa mahāyaśāḥ // BndP_2,59.80 //
GP12brndp2_u:8626: merupṛṣṭhe tapo ghoramadyāpi carate prabhuḥ // BndP_2,59.81 //
GP12brndp2_u:8628: tvaṣṭā tu tena rūpeṇa viṣṇoścakramakalpayat // BndP_2,59.82 //
GP12brndp2_u:8630: yavīyasī tayoryā tu yamunāca yaśasvinī // BndP_2,59.83 //
GP12brndp2_u:8632: yastu jyeṣṭho mahātejāḥ sargo yasyeti sāṃpratam // BndP_2,59.84 //
GP12brndp2_u:8634: idaṃ tu janma devānāṃ śṛṇuyādvā paṭhecca vā // BndP_2,59.85 //
GP12brndp2_u:8636: āpadaṃ prāpya mucyeta prāpnuyācca mahadyaśaḥ // BndP_2,59.86 //
GP12brndp2_u:8637: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte tṛtīya upoddhātapāde vaivasvatotpattirnāmaikonaṣaṣṭitamodhyāyaḥ // 59//
GP12brndp2_u:8644: karūṣaśca pṛṣadhraśca navaite mānavāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_2,60.3 //
GP12brndp2_u:8645: brahmaṇā tu manuḥ pūrvaṃ coditastu prabodhitam /
GP12brndp2_u:8646: yaṣṭuṃ prajakrame kāmaṃ hayamedhena bhūpatiḥ // BndP_2,60.4 //
GP12brndp2_u:8650: divyāsaṃhananā caiva ilā jajña iti śrutam // BndP_2,60.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:8652: anugacchasva bhadraṃ te tamilā pratyuvāca ha // BndP_2,60.7 //
GP12brndp2_u:8655: tayoḥ sakāśaṃ yāsyāmi māto dharmo hato vadhīt /
GP12brndp2_u:8658: aṃśe 'sminyuvayorjātā devau kiṃ karavāṇi vām // BndP_2,60.10 //
GP12brndp2_u:8660: tathā tu bruvatīṃ sādhvīmiḍāmāśritya tāvubhau // BndP_2,60.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:8662: anena tava dharmajñe praśrayoṇa damena ca // BndP_2,60.12 //
GP12brndp2_u:8663: satyena caiva suśroṇi prītau svau varavarṇini /
GP12brndp2_u:8664: āvayostvaṃ mahābhāge khyātiṃ kanye prayāsyasi // BndP_2,60.13 //
GP12brndp2_u:8668: sā tu devī varaṃ labdhvā nivṛttā pitaraṃ prati // BndP_2,60.15 //
GP12brndp2_u:8675: dikpūrvā tasya rājarṣergayasya tu gayā purī /
GP12brndp2_u:8676: praviṣṭetu manau tasminprajāḥ sṛṣṭvā divākaram // BndP_2,60.19 //
GP12brndp2_u:8682: etacchrutvā tu ṛṣayaḥ papracchuḥ sūtajaṃ prati /
GP12brndp2_u:8683: mānavaḥ sa tu sudyamnaḥ strībhāvamagamatkatham // BndP_2,60.22 //
GP12brndp2_u:8689: provāca vacanaṃ devī priyahetoḥ priyaṃ priyā /
GP12brndp2_u:8690: imaṃ mamāśramaṃ deva yaḥ pumānsaṃ pravekṣyati // BndP_2,60.25 //
GP12brndp2_u:8691: bhaviṣyati dhruvaṃ nārī sa tulyāpsarasāṃ śubhā /
GP12brndp2_u:8692: tatra sarvāṇi bhūtāni piśācāḥ paśavaśca ye // BndP_2,60.26 //
GP12brndp2_u:8694: umāvanaṃ praviṣṭastu sa rājā mṛgayāṃ gataḥ // BndP_2,60.27 //
GP12brndp2_u:8698: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe madhyamabhāge vāyuprokte vaivasvatamanoḥ sṛṣṭirnāma ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 60//
GP12brndp2_u:8701: pṛṣadhro hiṃsayitvā tu gurorgāṃ niśi tatkṣaye // BndP_2,61.1 //
GP12brndp2_u:8703: karūṣasya tu kārūṣāḥ kṣattriyā yuddhadurmadāḥ // BndP_2,61.2 //
GP12brndp2_u:8710: ṛddhiṃ dṛṣṭvā tu yajñasya kruddhastasya bṛhaspatiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:8711: saṃvarttena tate yajñe cukopa sa bhṛśaṃ tadā // BndP_2,61.6 //
GP12brndp2_u:8721: kanyā tu tasyeḍaviḍāmātā viśravaso hi sā // BndP_2,61.11 //
GP12brndp2_u:8736: putraḥ sukanyā kanyā ca bhāryā yā cyavanasya ca /
GP12brndp2_u:8737: ānarttasya tu dāyādo revo nāma suvīryavān // BndP_2,61.19 //
