GP12brndp2_u:11543: sa tena nigṛhītastu na cacāla padātpadam /
GP12brndp2_u:11544: tato 'bravīd vṛṣastaṃ vai suṃca māṃ balināṃ vara // BndP_2,74.50 //
GP12brndp2_u:11546: tryaṃbakaṃ vahatā devaṃ yato jāto 'smi bhūtale // BndP_2,74.51 //
GP12brndp2_u:11547: suṃca māṃ balināṃ śreṣṭha pratisnehaṃ varaṃ vṛṇu /
GP12brndp2_u:11548: evamukto 'bravīdenaṃ jīvaṃstvaṃ me kva yāsyasi // BndP_2,74.52 //
GP12brndp2_u:11549: tena tvāhaṃ na mokṣyāmi parasvādaṃ catuṣpadam /
GP12brndp2_u:11550: tatastaṃ dīrghatamasaṃ sa vṛṣaḥ pratyuvāca ha // BndP_2,74.53 //
GP12brndp2_u:11551: nāsmākaṃ vidyate tāta pātakaṃ steyameva ca /
GP12brndp2_u:11552: bhakṣyābhakṣyaṃ na jānīmaḥ peyāpeyaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // BndP_2,74.54 //
GP12brndp2_u:11553: kāryā kāryaṃ ca vai vipra gamyagamyaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp2_u:11554: na pāpmāno vayaṃ vipra dharmo hyeṣa gavāṃ śrutaḥ // BndP_2,74.55 //
GP12brndp2_u:11555: gavāṃ nāma sa ve śrutvā saṃbhrāntasta mamuñcata /
GP12brndp2_u:11556: bhaktyā cānuśravikayā gosutaṃ vai prasādayan // BndP_2,74.56 //
GP12brndp2_u:11562: godharma vai balaṃ kṛtvā snuṣāṃ sa hyabhyamanyata // BndP_2,74.59 //
GP12brndp2_u:11563: viparyayaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā śaradvānpravicintya ca /
GP12brndp2_u:11564: bhaviṣyamarthaṃ jñātvā ca mahātmā tvavamatya tam // BndP_2,74.60 //
GP12brndp2_u:11567: durvṛttaṃ tvāṃ tyajāmyeṣa gaccha tvaṃ svena karmaṇā /
GP12brndp2_u:11569: tenāsi tvaṃ parityakto durācāro 'si me mataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11572: nirbhartsya caiva bahuśo bāhubhyāṃ parigṛhya ca /
GP12brndp2_u:11573: koṣṭe samudre prakṣipya gaṅgāṃbhasi samutsṛjat // BndP_2,74.64 //
GP12brndp2_u:11575: taṃ sastrīko balirnāma rājā dharmārthatattvavit // BndP_2,74.65 //
GP12brndp2_u:11577: taṃ gṛhītvā sa dharmātmā balirvairocanastadā // BndP_2,74.66 //
GP12brndp2_u:11579: prītaḥ sa vai vareṇātha cchandayāmāsa vai balim // BndP_2,74.67 //
GP12brndp2_u:11580: sa ca tasmādvaraṃ vavre putrārthī dānavarṣabhaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11582: saṃtānārthaṃ mahābhāga bhāryāyāṃ mama mānada // BndP_2,74.68 //
GP12brndp2_u:11585: sudeṣṇāṃ nāma bhāryāṃ svāṃ rājāsmai prāhiṇottadā /
GP12brndp2_u:11586: andhaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā na sā devī jagāma ha // BndP_2,74.70 //
GP12brndp2_u:11587: svāṃ ca dhātreyikāṃ tasmai bhūṣayitvā vyasarjayat /
GP12brndp2_u:11590: kakṣīvaccakṣuṣau tau tu dṛṣṭvā rājā balistadā // BndP_2,74.72 //
GP12brndp2_u:11594: netyuvāca tatastaṃ tu mamaitāviti cābravīt // BndP_2,74.74 //
GP12brndp2_u:11596: andhaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca māṃ matvā sudeṣṇā mahiṣī tava // BndP_2,74.75 //
GP12brndp2_u:11599: balirbhāryāṃ sudeṣṇā ca bhartsayāmāsa vai prabhuḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11601: tāṃ sa dīrghatamā devīmabravīdyadi māṃ śubhe /
GP12brndp2_u:11602: dadhnā lavaṇamiśreṇa svabhyaktaṃ nagnakaṃ tathā // BndP_2,74.78 //
GP12brndp2_u:11604: tatastvaṃ prāpsyase devi putrāṃśca manasepsitān // BndP_2,74.79 //
GP12brndp2_u:11605: tasya sā tadvaco devī sarvaṃ kṛtavatī tathā /
GP12brndp2_u:11606: apānaṃ ca samāsādya jugupsaṃtī hyavarjayat // BndP_2,74.80 //
GP12brndp2_u:11608: vināpānaṃ kumāraṃ tvaṃ janayiṣyasi pūrvajam // BndP_2,74.81 //
GP12brndp2_u:11609: tatastaṃ dīrghatamasaṃ sā devī pratyuvāca ha //
GP12brndp2_u:11610: nārhasi tvaṃ mahābhāga putraṃ dātuṃ mamedṛśam // BndP_2,74.82 //
GP12brndp2_u:11612: tavāparadho devyeṣa nānyathā bhavitā tu vai /
GP12brndp2_u:11613: devīdṛśaṃ ca te pautramahaṃ dāsyāmi suprate // BndP_2,74.83 //
GP12brndp2_u:11615: tāṃ sa dīrghatamāścaiva kukṣau spṛṣṭvadamabravīt // BndP_2,74.84 //
GP12brndp2_u:11617: tena te pūrito garbhaḥ paurṇamāsyāmivodadhiḥ // BndP_2,74.85 //
GP12brndp2_u:11623: ityete dīrghatamasā balerdattāḥ sutāḥ purā // BndP_2,74.88 //
GP12brndp2_u:11626: tato manuṣyayonyāṃ vai janayāmāsa sa prajāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11629: bhaktyā cānanyayāsmāsu mune prītāsmi tena te // BndP_2,74.91 //
GP12brndp2_u:11630: tasmāttava tamo dīrghaṃ nistadāmyadya paśya vai /
GP12brndp2_u:11631: bārhaspatyaṃ ca yatte 'nyatpāpaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate tanau // BndP_2,74.92 //
GP12brndp2_u:11635: gavā hṛtatamāḥ so 'tha gautamaḥ samapadyata // BndP_2,74.94 //
GP12brndp2_u:11636: kakṣīvāṃstu tato gatvā saha pitrā girivrajam /
GP12brndp2_u:11637: yathoddiṣṭaṃ hi pitrātha cacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ // BndP_2,74.95 //
GP12brndp2_u:11638: tataḥ kālena mahatā tapasā bhāvitaḥ sa vai /
GP12brndp2_u:11641: suputreṇa tvayā tāta kṛtārthaśca yaśasvinā // BndP_2,74.97 //
GP12brndp2_u:11644: kūṣmāṇḍā gautamāste vai smṛtāḥ kakṣīvataḥ sutāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11648: kṛtārthaḥ so 'pi yogātmā yogamāśritya ca prabhuḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11654: ete ekṣvākavaḥ proktā bhavitāraḥ kalau yuge /
GP12brndp2_u:11659: sumitraṃ prāpya rājānaṃ saṃsthāṃ prāpsyati vai kalau // BndP_2,74.106 //
GP12brndp2_u:11661: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi magadho yo bṛhadrathaḥ // BndP_2,74.107 //
GP12brndp2_u:11663: atītā varttamānāśca bhaviṣyāśca tathā punaḥ // BndP_2,74.108 //
GP12brndp2_u:11667: pañcāśataṃ tathāṣṭau ca samā rājyamakārayat // BndP_2,74.110 //
GP12brndp2_u:11670: samāḥ śataṃ nirāmitro mahīṃ bhuktvā divaṃ gataḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11671: pañcāśataṃ samāḥ ṣaṭ ca sukṣatraḥ prāptavānmahīm // BndP_2,74.112 //
GP12brndp2_u:11673: senājitsāṃprataṃ cāpi etā vai bhokṣyate samāḥ // BndP_2,74.113 //
GP12brndp2_u:11677: aṣṭapañjāśataṃ jābdānrājye sthāsyati vai śuciḥ // BndP_2,74.115 //
GP12brndp2_u:11679: suvratastu catuḥṣaṣṭiṃ rājyaṃ prāpsyati vīryavān // BndP_2,74.116 //
GP12brndp2_u:11685: catvāriṃśatsamā rājā sunetro bhokṣyate tataḥ // BndP_2,74.119 //
GP12brndp2_u:11689: dvāviṃśacca nṛpā hyete bhavitāro bṛhadrathāḥ // BndP_2,74.121 //
GP12brndp2_u:11690: pūrmaṃ varṣasahasraṃ vai teṣāṃ rājyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GP12brndp2_u:11693: miṣatāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ hi pradyotiṃ nṛpatiṃ balāt // BndP_2,74.123 //
GP12brndp2_u:11695: trayoviṃśatsamā rājā bhavitā sa narottamaḥ // BndP_2,74.124 //
GP12brndp2_u:11697: viśākhayūpo bhavitā nṛpaḥ pañcāśataṃ samāḥ // BndP_2,74.125 //
GP12brndp2_u:11700: aṣṭatriṃśacchataṃ bhāvyāḥ prādyotāḥ pañca te nṛpāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11701: hatvā teṣāṃ yaśaḥ kṛtsnaṃ śiśunāgo bhaviṣyati // BndP_2,74.127 //
GP12brndp2_u:11705: tatastu viṃśatiṃ rājā kṣemadharmā bhavaṣyati // BndP_2,74.129 //
GP12brndp2_u:11711: sa vai puravaraṃ rājā vṛthivyāṃ kusumāhvayam // BndP_2,74.132 //
GP12brndp2_u:11713: catvāriśatsamā bhāvyo rājā vai nandivarddhanaḥ // BndP_2,74.133 //
GP12brndp2_u:11717: etaiḥ sārddhaṃ bhaviṣyanti tāvatkālaṃ nṛpāḥ pare // BndP_2,74.135 //
GP12brndp2_u:11723: tulyakālaṃ bhaviṣyanti sarvaṃ eva mahīkṣitaḥ // BndP_2,74.138 //
GP12brndp2_u:11727: ekarāṭ sa mahāpadma ekaccatro bhaviṣyati // BndP_2,74.140 //
GP12brndp2_u:11729: sarvakṣatraṃ samuddhṛtya bhāvinor'thasya vai balāt // BndP_2,74.141 //
GP12brndp2_u:11731: mahāpadmasya paryāye bhaviṣyanti nṛpāḥ kramāt // BndP_2,74.142 //
GP12brndp2_u:11733: bhuktvā mahīṃ varṣaśataṃ naredraḥ sa bhaviṣyati // BndP_2,74.143 //
GP12brndp2_u:11737: ṣaṭtriṃśattu samā rājā aśokānāṃ ca tṛptidaḥ // BndP_2,74.145 //
GP12brndp2_u:11739: kuśālasūnuraṣṭau ca bhoktā vai bandhupālitaḥ // BndP_2,74.146 //
GP12brndp2_u:11741: bhavitā sapta varṣāṇi devavarmā narādhipaḥ // BndP_2,74.147 //
GP12brndp2_u:11743: bṛhadrathaśca varṣāṇi sapta vai bhavitā nṛpaḥ // BndP_2,74.148 //
GP12brndp2_u:11744: ityete nava mauryā vai bhokṣyanti ca vasuṃdharām /
GP12brndp2_u:11745: saptatriṃśacchataṃ pūrṇaṃ tebhyaḥ śuṅgo gamiṣyati // BndP_2,74.149 //
GP12brndp2_u:11747: kārayiṣyati vai rājyaṃ samāḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ sa caiva tu // BndP_2,74.150 //
GP12brndp2_u:11749: bhavitā cāpi sujyeṣṭaḥ sapta varṣāṇi vai tataḥ // BndP_2,74.151 //
GP12brndp2_u:11751: tato bhadraḥ same dve tu bhaviṣyati nṛpaśca vai // BndP_2,74.152 //
GP12brndp2_u:11753: rājā ghoṣastataścāpi varṣāṇi bhavitā trayaḥ // BndP_2,74.153 //
GP12brndp2_u:11754: sapta vai vajra mitraṃstu samā rājā tataḥ punaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11755: dvātriṃśadbhavitā vāpi samā bhāgavato nṛpaḥ // BndP_2,74.154 //
GP12brndp2_u:11758: śataṃ pūrmaṃ daśa dve ca tebhyaḥ kaṇvaṃ gamiṣyati /
GP12brndp2_u:11760: devabhūmiṃ tato hatvā śuṅgeṣu bhavitā nṛpaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11761: bhaviṣyati samā rājā pañca kaṇvāyanastu saḥ // BndP_2,74.157 //
GP12brndp2_u:11769: trayoviṃśatsamā rājā siṃdhuko bhavitā tvatha // BndP_2,74.161 //
GP12brndp2_u:11771: śrīśāntakarṇirbhavitā tasya putrastu vai mahān // BndP_2,74.162 //
GP12brndp2_u:11772: pañcāśattu samāḥ ṣaṭ ca śāntakarṇir bhaviṣyati /
GP12brndp2_u:11773: āpolavodvādaśa vai tasya putro bhaviṣyati // BndP_2,74.163 //
GP12brndp2_u:11776: tataḥ saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇaṃ hālo rājā bhaviṣyati /
GP12brndp2_u:11781: rājā ca gautamī putra ekaviṃśatsamā nṛpaḥ // BndP_2,74.167 //
GP12brndp2_u:11785: pulomāriḥ samāḥ sapta tataścaiṣāṃ bhaviṣyati // BndP_2,74.169 //
GP12brndp2_u:11786: ityete vai nṛpāstriṃśadandhrā bhokṣyanti vai mahīm /
GP12brndp2_u:11787: samāḥ śatāni catvāri pañcāśatṣaṭ tathaiva ca // BndP_2,74.170 //
GP12brndp2_u:11788: andhrāṇāṃ saṃsthitāḥ pañca teṣāṃ vaṃśyāśca ye punaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11789: saptaiva tu bhaviṣyanti daśābhīrāstato nṛpāḥ // BndP_2,74.171 //
GP12brndp2_u:11790: sapta gardabhinaścāpi tato 'tha daśa vai śakāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11793: andhrā bhokṣyanti vasudhāṃ śate dve ca śatañca vai // BndP_2,74.173 //
GP12brndp2_u:11796: śatāni trīṇyaśītiṃ ca bhokṣyanti vasudhāṃ śakāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11797: āśītī dve ca varṣāṇi bhoktāro yavanā mahīm // BndP_2,74.175 //
GP12brndp2_u:11801: śatāni trīṇi bhokṣyante maunā ekādaśaiva tu // BndP_2,74.177 //
GP12brndp2_u:11802: teṣu cchinneṣu kālena tataḥ kilakilo nṛpaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11804: samāḥ ṣaṇṇavatiṃ caiva pṛthivīṃ tu sameṣyati /
GP12brndp2_u:11807: bhogī bhaviṣyate rājā nṛpo nāgakulodvahaḥ // BndP_2,74.180 //
GP12brndp2_u:11809: dhanadharmā tataścāpi caturtho vaṃśajaḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_2,74.181 //
GP12brndp2_u:11811: tasya bhrātā yavīyāṃstu nāmnā nandiyaśāḥ kila // BndP_2,74.182 //
GP12brndp2_u:11813: daihitraḥ śiśiko nāma pūrikāyāṃ nṛpo 'bhavat // BndP_2,74.183 //
GP12brndp2_u:11815: bhokṣyate ca samāḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ purīṃ kāñcanakāṃ ca vai // BndP_2,74.184 //
GP12brndp2_u:11817: tasya putrāstu catvāro bhaviṣyanti narādhipāḥ // BndP_2,74.185 //
GP12brndp2_u:11819: supratīko gabhīraśca samā bhokṣyati viṃśatim // BndP_2,74.186 //
GP12brndp2_u:11822: mekalāyāṃ nṛpāḥ sapta bhaviṣyanti ca saptatiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11823: komalāyāṃ tu rājāno bhaviṣyanti mahābalāḥ // BndP_2,74.188 //
GP12brndp2_u:11824: meghā iti samākhyātā buddhimanto navaiva tu /
GP12brndp2_u:11834: nava nāgāstu bhokṣyati purīṃ caṃpāvatīṃ nṛpāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11835: mathurāṃ ca purā ramyāṃ nāgā bhokṣyanti sapta vai // BndP_2,74.194 //
GP12brndp2_u:11841: caṃpāṃ caiva purīṃ ramyāṃ bhokṣyante devarakṣitāḥ // BndP_2,74.197 //
GP12brndp2_u:11845: tulyakālaṃ bhaviṣyanti sarve hyate mahīkṣitaḥ // BndP_2,74.199 //
GP12brndp2_u:11851: vihīnāstu bhaviṣyanti dharmataḥ kāma tor'thataḥ // BndP_2,74.202 //
GP12brndp2_u:11853: viparyayeṇa vartante nāśāyiṣyanti vai prajāḥ // BndP_2,74.203 //
GP12brndp2_u:11855: teṣāṃ varttati paryāye bahustrīke yuge tadā // BndP_2,74.204 //
GP12brndp2_u:11857: tathā gatāsu vai kāṣṭhaṃ prajāsu jagatīśvarāḥ // BndP_2,74.205 //
GP12brndp2_u:11859: kalkinā vyāhatāḥ sarve mlecchā yāsyanti saṃkṣayam // BndP_2,74.206 //
GP12brndp2_u:11861: pranaṣṭe nṛpaśabde ca saṃdhyāśiṣṭe kalau yuge // BndP_2,74.207 //
GP12brndp2_u:11862: kiñcicchiṣṭāḥ prajāstā vai dharme naṣṭe parigrahāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11866: tyaktvā purāṇi grāmāṃśca bhaviṣyanti vanaukasaḥ // BndP_2,74.210 //
GP12brndp2_u:11868: naṣṭe snehe durāpannā bhraṣṭasnehāḥ suhṛjjanaḥ // BndP_2,74.211 //
GP12brndp2_u:11874: kṛtsnaṃ himavataḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ kūlaṃ ca lavaṇāṃbhasaḥ // BndP_2,74.214 //
GP12brndp2_u:11878: cīraṃ parṇaṃ ca vividhaṃ valkalānyajināni ca // BndP_2,74.216 //
GP12brndp2_u:11880: bījānnāni tathā nimneṣvī hantaḥ kāṣṭhaśaṅkubhiḥ // BndP_2,74.217 //
GP12brndp2_u:11894: sa saṃdhyāṃśe tu niḥśeṣe kṛtaṃ vai pratipatsyate // BndP_2,74.224 //
GP12brndp2_u:11896: ekarāśau bhaviṣyanti tadā kṛtayugaṃ bhavet // BndP_2,74.225 //
GP12brndp2_u:11897: eṣa vaṃśakramaḥ kṛtsnaḥ kīrtito vo yathākramam /
GP12brndp2_u:11901: pramāṇaṃ vai tathā vaktuṃ mahāpadmottaraṃ ca yat /
GP12brndp2_u:11902: antaraṃ ca śatānyaṣṭau ṣaṭtriṃśacca samāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_2,74.228 //
GP12brndp2_u:11906: saptaviṃśaiḥ śatairbhāvyā andhrāṇāṃ te 'nvayāḥ punaḥ // BndP_2,74.230 //
GP12brndp2_u:11910: māsā divyāḥ smṛtāḥ ṣaṭca divyābdāścaiva sapta hi // BndP_2,74.232 //
GP12brndp2_u:11911: tebhyaḥ pravartate kālo divyaḥ saptarṣibhistu taiḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11912: saptarṣīṇāṃ tu yau pūrvau dṛśyete uttarādiśi // BndP_2,74.233 //
GP12brndp2_u:11913: tayormadhye ca nakṣatraṃ dṛśyate yatsamaṃ divi /
GP12brndp2_u:11914: tena saptarṣayo yuktā jñeyā vyomni śataṃ samāḥ // BndP_2,74.234 //
GP12brndp2_u:11916: saptarṣayo hyathāyuktāḥ kāle parīkṣite śatam // BndP_2,74.235 //
GP12brndp2_u:11918: imāstadā tu prakṛtīrvyāpatsyante prajā bhṛśam // BndP_2,74.236 //
GP12brndp2_u:11920: śrautasmārtte praśithile dharme varṇāśrame tadā // BndP_2,74.237 //
GP12brndp2_u:11922: saṃsaktāśca bhaviṣyanti śūdrāḥ sārddhaṃ dvijātibhiḥ // BndP_2,74.238 //
GP12brndp2_u:11925: lavāllavaṃ bhraśyamānāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ krameṇa tu /
GP12brndp2_u:11927: yasminkṛṣṇo divyaṃ yātasta sminneva tadā dine /
GP12brndp2_u:11930: ṣaṣṭiṃ caiva sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ tūcyate kaliḥ // BndP_2,74.242 //
GP12brndp2_u:11931: divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu tatsaṃdhyāṃśe hi kīrtite /
GP12brndp2_u:11932: niḥśeṣe ca tadā tasminkṛtaṃ vai pratipatsyate // BndP_2,74.243 //
GP12brndp2_u:11934: ikṣvākostu samṛtaṃ kṣattraṃ sumitrāntaṃ vivasvataḥ // BndP_2,74.244 //
GP12brndp2_u:11935: ailaṃ kṣattraṃ kṣemakāntaṃ soma vaṃśavido viduḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11936: ete vivasvataḥ putrāḥ kīrtitāḥ kīrttivarddhanāḥ // BndP_2,74.245 //
GP12brndp2_u:11938: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣattriyā vaiśyaḥ śūdrāścaivātra ye smṛtāḥ // BndP_2,74.246 //
GP12brndp2_u:11943: etasyāṃ tu yugākhyāyāṃ yataḥ kṣattraṃ prapatsyate /
GP12brndp2_u:11944: tathā hi kathayiṣyāmi gadato me nibodhata // BndP_2,74.249 //
GP12brndp2_u:11945: devāpiḥ pauravo rājā aikṣvākuścaiva yo maruḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11948: suvarcā nāma putrastu ikṣvākostu bhaviṣyati // BndP_2,74.251 //
GP12brndp2_u:11952: evaṃ sarvatra vijñeyaṃ saṃtānārthe tu latraṇam // BndP_2,74.253 //
GP12brndp2_u:11953: kṣīṇe kaliyuge tasminbhaviṣye ta kṛte yuge /
GP12brndp2_u:11954: saptarṣibhistu taiḥ sārddhamādye tretāyuge punaḥ // BndP_2,74.254 //
GP12brndp2_u:11956: dvāparāṃśena tiṣṭhanti kṣatriyā ṛṣibhiḥ saha // BndP_2,74.255 //
GP12brndp2_u:11957: bhaviṣye tu tataḥ sarge kāle kṛtayuge punaḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11958: bījārthaṃ te bhaviṣyanti brahmakṣatrasya vai punaḥ // BndP_2,74.256 //
GP12brndp2_u:11960: saptarṣayo nṛpaiḥ sārddhaṃ saṃtānārthaṃ yugeyuge // BndP_2,74.257 //
GP12brndp2_u:11962: manvantarāṇāṃ saptānāṃ saṃtānaśca śrutaśca te // BndP_2,74.258 //
GP12brndp2_u:11964: yathā pravṛttisteṣāṃ vai pravṛttānāṃ tathā kṣayaḥ // BndP_2,74.259 //
GP12brndp2_u:11976: tāvadeva tu bhojānāṃ vistaro dviguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_2,74.265 //
GP12brndp2_u:11977: bhajate tryaṃśakaṃ kṣattraṃ caturthātta dyathā diśam /
GP12brndp2_u:11979: śataṃ vai prativindhyānāṃ śataṃ nāgāḥ sahaihayāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:11981: śataṃ ca brahmadattānāṃ śāriṇāṃ viriṇāṃ śatam /
GP12brndp2_u:11982: tataḥ śataṃ tu paulānāṃ śvetakāśya kuśādayaḥ // BndP_2,74.268 //
GP12brndp2_u:11995: punaruktibahutvācca na śakya tu yugaiḥ saha /
GP12brndp2_u:11996: ete yayātiputrāṇāṃ pañca vaṃśā viśāṃ hitāḥ // BndP_2,74.275 //
GP12brndp2_u:11998: labhate ca varānpañca durlabhā niha laukikān // BndP_2,74.276 //
GP12brndp2_u:12001: ityeṣa vo mayā pādastṛtīyaḥ kathito dvijāḥ /
GP12brndp2_u:12002: vistareṇānupūrvyā ca kiṃ bhūyo varṇayāmyaham // BndP_2,74.278 //
GP12brndp2_u:12003: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde vaṃśānuvarṇanaṃ nāma catuḥsaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ // 74//
